history.title: Awesome foundation!
history.text: I am so glad they made a product like this because I can never seem to find the right color to match my skin and I end up with that Foundation the line on my chin with the two different colors. Not only is this product lightweight, it smells nice, plus it blends in with my skin tone almost perfectly. This is definitely going to be my go to Foundation.

history.title: Softness again!
history.text: Made my hair soft again! Not the easiest thing to get on when you have long hair but I managed. Then after the time required I wash my hair and couldn't believe how soft it was. It hasn't been that soft in a long time. So I definitely think it was worth the trouble stuffing all my hair in there and letting it sit plus it doesn't smell the greatest, nor does it smell bad I'm just used to very perfumed shampoos. But I'll definitely be using it again.

history.title: Good for your pores 🧼🧼🧼
history.text: Great for your pores and acne. My husband's back started breaking out and after using this for a few days it's clearing up and looks less irritated. Plus it came with a bag which I didn't know what for until I read the instructions and it is a foaming bag and it really makes the soap foam!

history.title: Been obsessed with gels 💅🏻
history.text:
I've had an obsession with gels with my time off from work these past months and I wanted to try this color changing polish.
It comes with designs and while the color itself is dark it does change.
I am enjoying trying the designs but man it does take practice!!!

history.title: Check these nails out!
history.text: Never tried poly gel before, definitely not easy but worth it! Check out my nails in the photo, came out beautifully and they are very strong!

target.title: Perfect for removal
target.text:
This kit comes with everything you need to take off nail polish.
This particular set was for my mother in law who is just getting into gel polishes and she didn't understand what the clips were for at first 🤣
After I showed her how it took off the polish with scrubbing she was SOOOOO glad I got her this set!

history.title: Way too yellow - not as moist
history.text: way too yellow and not as wrinkle friendly or moist

history.title: Love!
history.text: My hair is picky - But this gives me HEALTHY HAIR!

target.title: Left on 5 mins only - per instructions (and new highlights) - didnt work
target.text: Hate gloves idea - i use product in shower because of dye risk on surfaces- left on 5 mins but hair showed zero result

history.title: cold jade feels good on face
history.text:
Jade roller and jade scraper comes in pleasant looking box with a small bag to store these items in. It would make for a nice gift. Product claims to be made of real jade, which I looked for in making my decision.

The jade roller feels good on the face, especially when first being used due to the coolness of the stone. I wouldn't normally buy something like this, but I already massage my face a little every day (fluid build up), so I thought this would be an interesting way to change things up.

Again, I love the feel of the cool stone rolling across my face. I have rosacea and it just feels so comforting on my reddened skin. I haven't been real consistent with its use so I can not attest to how effective it is in terms of benefits to the skin. It does provide a gentle massage, which is good for draining lymph nodes and helping to reduce swelling. I am using it before I put on moisturizers, etc, as per recommendation on instructions. It says using this before hand will help the products work better. In my 40s with barely emerging fine lines, I am all for doing what I can to keep those at bay.

As I learn anything new, I will add to my review.

history.title: not salon straight, but natural straight looking results
history.text: It doesn't perfectly straighten the hair, but it definitely smooths it out, getting it pretty close to straight. The crush style straightener is pretty easy to use. It will take a little getting used to over using a flat plate straightener. I was concerned that I wouldn't be able to use it on my long, thick, wavy hair.. but I had no trouble with it. My first time using it was on not freshly washed hair- maybe a day or two after last shampoo. I used a little thermal protector, and then started swiping the brush through my hair. It took longer than using a flat plate to get hair smoothed out, but I do like the natural looking results. I like the ability to use a fine water mist- this helps to smooth out the hair.

target.title: great tool in helping to maintain a healthy mouth
target.text: So much better results than a manual toothbrush. So much better than a battery operated toothbrush. This really does a good job getting the teeth and gum area clean. Definitely helps in keeping mouth healthy. I have a used a few brands and they all do a good job- some last longer than others, some have replacement heads that can be purchased as generic, some dont. I usually purchased the name brand replacements. Anyway, I was always happy with my toothbrush.

history.title: Very comfortable
history.text: I bought these for my son who is on the autism spectrum.  Because of his sensory issues,  he hates the ear loops on his mask that he wears to school.  These are super comfortable and the mask loops can be moved to the side buttons.  I was a little concerned that he would get hot wearing a hat all day, but they are very lightweight and breathable.

history.title: Poor quality
history.text: It fell apart after a few uses

history.title: Glows under a blacklight
history.text: I bought these for my daughter who loves cosmic bowling.  I thought these would be great for tying her hair up and would look nice under the blacklight.  They are made out of a fluffy chenille material that is super stretchy.  They look nice in regular light, but really shine under a black light.

history.title: Super cute
history.text: I bought these for my daughter who loves unicorns.  She is also on the autism spectrum so she has a lot of sensory problems.  Brushing her hair can be a challenge because she hates when it pulls her hair.  These are a great idea because they are so comfortable.  The plastic bristles massage her scalp and the paddle shape smooths her hair without snagging.  Plus she loves the cool unicorn designs.

history.title: Good for makeup removal
history.text: I bought these for a friend who does theater.  He has to wear a lot of pancake makeup that is kind of hard to remove.  These are so much better than regular makeup wipes because of the texture and strength.  He can use a dry one first off to wipe away a lot of it then another one with make up remover to clean off the rest.  Afterwards,  he can throw them out instead of trying to wash a dirty washcloth every time.

history.title: Super cute
history.text: I bought this for my sister who is having a baby.  Her nursery has a black and white theme which kind of makes me feel like I am inside a domino,  but this fits in great.  A full sized refill pack of diaper wipes fits in it easily so there's no guesswork about how many to put inside.  The silicone lid ensures that it is airtight and the wipes don't dry out.  I mainly bought it for the big container,  but I really like the travel one that it came with too.  It's easy to fill and has a handle little handle for carrying it.

history.title: So easy to use
history.text: [[VIDEOID:cb9b4f9df532525269b6bd626cc29f60]] I have heard horror stories about people accidentally gluing their eyes shut with eyelash adhesive.  My sister wanted to try some for her wedding and I thought this would be a safer option.  It's as easy as applying eyeliner.  The magnets on the back of the lashes automatically stick to the eyeliner and stay in place until you remove them.  They seem well made and look natural.  The set includes 8 pairs of lashes, a case with a mirror,  the special eyeliner,  and even a pair of tweezers made for eyelashes.

history.title: Gross
history.text: I love lemon balm and I even grow my own.  I wanted to buy some to get me through the winter,  but this is not it.  I have no idea what it is, but it tastes like grass.  It's definitely not lemon balm.  At least I didn't spend too much on it.

target.title: Poorly designed top
target.text: I bought this for my homemade herbal tinctures.  Unfortunately,  the top was damaged and leaking.

history.title: Cooling and Calming
history.text:
If you live in a dry climate you will especially love this moisturizing, calming mask. It goes on like a gel and cools the skin while it refreshes your complexion. I can't say enough good things about this mask. I have sensitive skin and it calms redness and irritation completely. The truth is you will want to use this every day. I put the mask on at night before bedtime and leave it on for ten minutes. Once washed off my skin is baby soft and plumper. Hours later it still feels like my face is cool and comforted. It especially helped to calm my skin down after I used a serum with retinol in it. So this is something I will want on hand at all times as it is very healing.

~The Rebecca Review

history.title: Man Sized Minty Lip Balm
history.text:
I bought this for my husband and he loves it. It is man sized and will last a long time. He is using it now in the winter but I hear it is heat stable in the summer as well so he can leave it in the car. This tube is about three times the size of Burt's Bees lip balm. So if you want to make a man in your life happy this is the thing to buy. Chapped lips are no fun. This solves a big problem year round and is minty fresh too.

~The Rebecca Review

history.title: Sparkly Gloss - Mildly Flavored - Not Overly Sweet - Not Sticky!!!
history.text:
As a fan of the philosophy lip glosses I used to use the vanilla cake one which I miss not being able to purchase on its own these days. So this is my second favorite and it is nice and sparkly, mildly flavored, not overly sweet and definitely not sticky. What is not to love?

I use a lip balm first, apply a lipstick and then put this on top to hold the look together. It lasts quite a while or until you eat something, then you need to reapply. But I put this on before I go out and it lasts for hours. So I hope this flavor is going to be around for a while. :) I will admit that sometimes I even wear this one to bed! Love, love love!!!

~The Rebecca Review

history.title: Fine Mist of Oil Creates a Glistening Shine
history.text:
If your hair takes a lot of abuse with heated drying and hot styling tools this fine mist creates a glistening moisturizing shine on your hair. I've been finding out lately how the hemp plant can make you more beautiful and even lose weight and cause your skin to be clear. This hair shine product is the icing on the cake of your hemp expenditures.

The scent of this oil is very mild and pleasant. The oil is such a fine mist that it does not weight down the hair and seems to absorb well leaving a glossy shine. I saw this product a while ago and finally purchased some for myself! It will impress you with its natural ingredients and beautifying effects. I love it and I think after doing research around you will find this is the best shine product.

This ships in a plastic bag but I did not find it leaking at all! Happy about that!

~The Rebecca Review

history.title: Body Lotion That Also Works As A Hand Cream!
history.text:
I keep a bottle of this lotion in three rooms of my house because I love it that much. I have one in the bathroom on the counter, one in the kitchen and one on my bedside table. That way any time I need a hand cream this is available. I also use this as a body lotion. This is the one Zum fragranced cream that smells the best to me and the scent dissipates quickly after use. To be honest my hands look ten years younger when using this particular lotion. There are a lot of essential oils in it so I think it is antiaging. I also love the particular scent of the Bulgarian lavender.

~The Rebecca Review

target.title: Loved Two Movies!
target.text:
If you are looking for Harvest themed movies the first two in this collection are perfect. Harvest Love is about a woman who find herself again when she goes home for a vacation. The love story has the usual conflict at the start but the characters fall in love slowly and with a lot of restraint. No kissing until right at the end! Made me want to try pear desserts. Harvest Love is very innocent but has a little romantic dancing at a festival. I'd say it should be rated PG for this.

Pumpkin Pie Wars was really cute and I loved that the women in the movie all ended up friends again in the end. Basically you have two best friends who have a falling out and it takes years for them to even speak to each other again. The happy ending in this can't be beat! Plus lots of baking competitions and romance. A little kissing but that is it.

Truly Madly Sweetly made me feel uncomfortable for the most part because the characters were always in conflict. While the ending is happy I just felt like I would probably not watch it again. I don't mind when characters don't like each other at the start, but to be fighting for different goals basically the whole movie was not as enjoyable to watch. I also wondered what would really happen in their circumstance if the ex wife decided she wanted her husband back. It all felt a bit too risky for me.

But no violence, swearing or anything objectionable in any of the movies. The G rating seems true for the last two of the movies at least. PG for Harvest Love.

And I must admit my big strong husband came and sat right next to me while I was watching Harvest Love. These movies are enjoyable for men to watch too. Apparently. ;)))) He watched all three. But his question was..."Why are all these movies the same just with different actors?" I told him they are just what women love to watch over and over again. It is the romance we crave. So we enjoy watching two characters fall in love.

~The Rebecca Review

history.text: This toothpaste is good. That said, I got what I paid for here. It’s not anything earth shattering, it won’t make your teeth any cleaner than another toothpaste, help your gums heal, etc. but it IS a healthier choice! For that I give it 4 thoughtful stars. Tastes good as well.

history.text:
I like big bars and I cannot lie.
This is rich, luxurious and long lasting.
It makes my skin smell good, feel good and as a bonus the whole bathroom smells good!

target.title: These seem to just be the best bar soaps 🧼 on the market today
target.text:
What I love (and ALL the bar soaps I’ve ever purchased from this vendor has been wonderful) :
Oversized! It lasts a really LONG time ...no little slivers..it’s a great value!
Smells entirely wonderful...the scent wafts out of the bathroom ...into the hallway and makes the air I breath so beautiful (for both my husband AND myself). Makes for a good nights sleep.
Comes well packaged. Not shrink wrapped & difficult to access. The scent is nice so I like to stock up and have a drawer of them to scent our bathrooms until used.
I don’t know how they do this quality at this price...but it’s the best soap at the best price. Go get some, you’ll be happy too.

history.title: You either love it or hate it
history.text: If you like bay rum, then you'll like Florida Water. If you don't like bay rum after a hot shave then something is wrong with you. Turn in your man card immediately.

history.title: Like the other sets it's difficult to get a clean ...
history.text: Ideas are limitless with the buffet sections on the three plates. Like the other sets it's difficult to get a clean scrape on some of the corner images. But I do think it helps if you have a very flexible scraper, which I don't.

history.title: Love this stuff!
history.text: This is my first time using plain silk wrap and I love it!  I started using the self adhesive silk tabs to fix cracks and they worked great so I wrapped all my nails but I had to keep buying them. So I upgraded to this. I'm so glad I did. Yes it takes longer to do my nails now but it's so totally worth it. I wrap my nails every week or so and there's still so much of it left! I will not buy anything else, EVER!

history.title: Another great set of images!
history.text: "Jeff's Wife"-  Great plates and images that stamp beautifully, as always from Cici & Sisi. I do have two issues. One is that four of the six sleeves are cracked in the corners, like it's old, dried out plastic but I guess it's nothing that some packing tape can't fix. I've never had this issue with the other five sets from them. The other issue is the holder feels a bit more foam like instead of the pleather like the previous ones. But those issues have absolutely nothing to do the stamping ability of the images which, in the end, is the most important thing!

history.title: Great stamping polishes!
history.text: "Jeff's Wife"- These are so good! I only wish I had the original versions to compare. I've only heard negative things about the original stamping polishes from BM so I don't own any, I've only used MdU. But when BM reformulated their stamping polishes I gave them a try and I now own all the new collections so I gave these a try too. Boy am I glad I did. These DID NOT DISAPPOINT! I don't own white stamping polish, I use Sinful Colors Snow Me White that has been open for 3 days, it works but it's still not proper stamping polish. The black I use is MdU, the absolute holy grail of stamping polishes. But I have to say that these are beyond good! This black is comparable to MdU black in every way, except the smell. These have just become my favorite! I don't think I will be ordering from anyone else anymore.

target.title: Good for Nail Art
target.text:
"Jeff's Wife" - This is not true to color, it dries quite a bit darker, as you can see from the pic, but since I only use it for nail art I don't care but some of you might. I bought the pink back in Feb. 2015, still using it just got tired of the color, and this one seems slightly less opaque but maybe it's because that one is pink on pale skin but a second coat fixes the opacity, (only 1 coat in the pic). It may leave a few specks of the shimmer on your skin when you peel it off but they wipe away effortlessly.

If you're new to nail art and want to use this for that, I do suggest you transfer some to an empty polish bottle (cleaned with acetone or brand new doesn't matter) using a syringe with some sort of tip, an eye dropper or even a straw, this will keep the large bottle from drying out. This 4 oz bottle will last you a very long time, I still have about half the bottle I bought in Feb. 2015, and costs a fraction of the price as those other brands marketed specifically for nail art.

history.title: if u need a quick wig
history.text:
the bundles are ok. I bleached them and died them and they are still soft. received the same day which was awesome for hair. If u need in a hurry this is the place. true to length ( in spots), no odor, bleached the knots and did not thin out the hairline it was ok. The frontal was super large, which i found crazy cause i have a large head. but better it be big than small and tight. Overall a good purchase for my first wig making adventure. probably would order again if the seller can guarantee the frontal and bundles match.

Update: a month after I have made my wig, the 360 frontal holding up. the bundles are ok. I have died and fried this hair many times. it is holding well.

history.title: Tasty Coffee Drops in a Tin
history.text:
We love coffee in our house so when I was presented with the opportunity to try these coffee drop candies in a tin I couldn’t pass them up. You get 3 cute little tins full of the candies and each had a freshness seal around them. The tin was easy to open, there were no sugar pieces from the coating that fell out, and each tin had 21 pieces in them. I found the size of the coffee drops to be quite adequate, not too small and not too big. I saw where a couple people thought they were huge but they’re about the size of a jelly bean but not as fat. They have a smooth coffee flavor with some sugar added in to make them the perfect little sweet. I found them to be very tasty and enjoyable. One candy at a time is plenty for a treat. They arrived in a cute black box that makes them perfect for gift giving and the tins are the perfect size to put in your purse, pocket, desk drawer, end table or pretty much anywhere else that you want to tuck away some coffee sweetness. We thought these were so good that we’re going to try one of Cavendish & Harvey’s variety packs next.

I received this item at a discount in exchange for an honest, unbiased review. However, that doesn't mean that I just automatically gave it a high rating and made up a review. All statements made are based upon my experience with the product as I always use each product for a period of time prior to leaving my comments in order to assist future purchasers.

My only problem is they are not non-slip. They didn't come off, but moved around enough that the hair tucked under around my temples and ears would bunch out. I have thin-ish shoulder length hair.

history.title: SPREADS EVENLY & CLEANS EASILY
history.text: My 18 year old grand daughter does her full face make up everyday whether she is leaving the house or not. I will admit she is pretty good at it, but she does spend alot of money on it. She had been using a sponge type and what she said that she really likes about this blender is that there is alot less waste of makeup, since the sponge absorbs it and this silicone blender spreads it. She said it spreads alot more evenly also and she was very happy with how she could clean it easily in water after each use.

history.title: LOVE IT
history.text: My grand daughter used this on many different areas of her body for high lighting purposes. She really liked it. Said it went on easily and stayed on. She is very fair skinned so it looked really nice and stood out. You get 4 colors and they are a matte with a sparklyness to it. It is a compact design and worked great for contouring also. She had no irritations or problems with it.

history.title: HEATS UP VERY FAST & WORKS GREAT
history.text: I can't believe how fast this flat iron heated up, it was like instantly. It has a nicely lit LCD screen. All the buttons are on the inside, which is good since I usually hit the controls on my hair curling wand because they are on the outside. The temperature is adjustable, I only needed it about halfway since I have a finer hair. It does come with a heat resistant glove, instructions and a carrying case/ storage bag. There is a little loop on the cord so you can hang it and the cord also rotates so it doesn't get all tangled up.

history.title: Full & beautiful!!
history.text:
This is a good quality full-looking scrunchie, I twist my long hair together, clip it to the top of my head, pull it up through the center & attach the scrunchie to the top of my head with small tortoise-shell clips (red-brown in hair color) on each side which can easily be concealed in the hair. It is comfortable & stays in place through a 12hr shift. Since I wear this on top of my head, it conceals my thinning hair in front & on top of my head. I blend it over my bangs in front. These are great for work & in hot weather to keep longer hair securely & comfortably off of your neck. I have also used larger plastic hairpins to also help comfortably secure these. I need larger scrunchies like this due to hair loss & a big head. It is not made to fit tightly over a ponytail.
I actually bought this color knowing it would not match my hair, which is a burgundy/brown shade, not too bright. I have been experimenting in coloring synthetic hair with Speedball acrylic ink & 70% alcohol in a spray bottle (see you-tube videos). I have successfully colored this to match my own hair color, which is difficult to match. By the way, I bought 2 other Katie colors: #33 "auburn" which is actually a dark brown shade with no red in it whatsoever, & #33/130 which is a dark brown blended with a light copper color. The 2nd was pretty, but just not the red shade I wanted.

target.title: 99J, How to use as top piece
target.text:
99J is a much darker red than pictured, but a very beautiful color. Even my pics look too light, almost auburn & not the very deep burgundy or black cherry color I received. At first glance, this appears unusable due to the very large seam showing in back & I almost sent it back. But I sprayed on liquid hair gel at the roots, teased it with my fingers, & used hair dryer heat to make the roots stick straight up, giving them lift, & also making the hair also flip backwards, which seemed impossible to do at first glance. I have now managed to cover that awful seam, transformed it from stiff, flat & boring to full, natural-looking & silky with no seams showing anywhere.
I may order another one to color a little lighter to wear when my red shade fades. I will take a pic of what it first looks like. I have colored many hair pieces, sometimes lightening them first with a color remover like color zap. I also curl them to match my own hair. Will attach styled pics of front, top, back, & underneath. I also saw online a spray-on color in dark red for roots that might help camouflage the seam.

history.title: Wonderful lip balm but smells different
history.text:
I bought this lip balm because I'm absolutely head over heels for the scent of the Bum Bum Cream (in addition to the cream I also have the shower gel and the body spray..that's how obsessed with it I am) but I was disappointed to find that this doesn't smell the same. It smells really good, it's just missing a few notes that the other products have. It mostly smells like vanilla with maybe a slight hint of caramel.
It's very moisturizing, I love how it feels on my lips, and overall it is a high quality lip balm that's worth it's price tag. However, if you're hoping it's going to smell like the cream, you're going to be disappointed. This is the only reason I'm giving it 4 stars.

target.title: Don’t love it but don’t hate it
target.text:
This foundation is a tricky one. There are things I really like about it and things that I don’t.
I bought it in the shade 04 Honey. In the bottle it looks like an almost exact match to my skin, but when I put it on it’s much paler with a decidedly pink undertone, yet it doesn’t look orange or too pink in my skin. I prefer a neutral undertone though since my skin can be both yellow and pink.

I love the bottle and packaging. It comes in a frosted glass bottle with a pink pump and pink cap that snaps on tightly.

The coverage is much higher than I expected and it is heavier than expected for a luminous foundation.

It covers blue tones better than redness. I have typically had to build it up in areas I have more redness (and we’re talking average redness, not anything extreme) and doing this makes it look much heavier so I end up using a concealer instead. The problem with this lies in the finish.

So this foundation’s finish is very confusing and hard to describe. It is very glowy and luminous without being shimmery but it has the heaviness of a matte. I know, confusing.
Areas can look too greasy or too dry. It settles into fine lines and creases around the eyes and nostrils. For this reason this is not a foundation I choose for the daytime. It’s much too heavy and shiny for the day, which is a shame because I enjoy it’s longevity. Once I set it with some powder around the eyes and my nostrils I really enjoy it for a night out.

I should also mention it is heavily perfumed with a floral scent so those sensitive to scented foundations will likely want to give this a pass. It’s not bothersome to me personally but fragrance can irritate really sensitive skin.

All in all I don’t use it as much as I hoped I would and probably won’t repurchase based on that and how heavy it is. At 36 I want a foundation with decent coverage but a lighter feel. It’s also not the easiest foundation to completely remove and when I wear it I have to use a cleaning oil and a cleanser both AND a miceller solution.

I have combo skin that can be prone to breakouts with certain brands but I haven’t broken out from this foundation.

I enjoy Holika Holika’s BB cream which is why I gave this a shot (and I like a luminous foundation) but I’ll probably stick with the BB cream in the future since it’s lighter.

history.title: Healed the eczema on my hands after nothing else did
history.text: I've tried dozens of creams and lotions for the eczema on my hands, so I figured there was a pretty good chance this would be another waste of money. I've been using it for a week, and the difference in my skin is amazing. Most of the cuts and cracks have healed, and all of the bumps between my fingers and on my palms have gone away. Based on other reviews, I was afraid this would make my skin feel like it's coated in something, but it doesn't. It's not completely waterproof, but it does help relieve the irritation from frequent handwashing. Before I go to bed, I put on a layer of lotion and then put a layer of this over the top. My skin stays nice and moisturized without the need to wear cotton gloves all night. I will be buying more of this!

history.title: Excellent alternative for sensitive skin

I love that not only is it safe for my skin, but it's safe for my kids, their toys, high chair trays, etc. And I can also use it to sanitize a tabletop or other surface when we're out and about.

I attached photos to show how the curl pattern was affected by the bleach (deep curl pattern still in effect, just went from a deep 4a to a 3b/3c (see the third pic).  In that 3rd pic, the first piece of hair is out of the pack, not washed or dyed; the second piece of hair is the bleached portion, and the third piece is just cowashed.  You can see beautiful curls in all three parts, so feel free to wash or bleach, the curls seem to be here to stay. Lastly, the length is very true (slightly longer, actually).

history.title: Five stars
history.text:
Not a miracle cream but it is quite good. Having really thin skin, cleaning every day and living in a colder area, means my hands are constantly dry, no matter the medical/over the counter/homemade creams I try and try. I get a quick release from dry cracked hands with this cream and I consider it to be towards the medical grade. I still consider wearing plastic gloves when cleaning and winter gloves outside, drinking lots of water, exfoliating and using moisturizer daily to be the way to go usually but this cream is a good try.
Given the price and the size of the tube, I do not believe I will be repurchasing. I do recommend it for people with similar problems.

target.title: BEAUTIFUL!
target.text:
WOWWW!! Why didn't I buy this months ago?! This is by far the prettiest, and now my favourite, out of my 4 wigs! I think I'll be buying several more of these so I'll never be without one! It's not shiny at all, very real looking. Is soft enough to feel like real hair. Will probably get matted at least slightly-moderately while wearing since ALL synthetic wigs do, so keep a pick in your purse and keep the unit conditioned with an appropriate wig spray or maybe a little silicone-based leave-in hair gloss, like Biosilk. Wig experts or YouTube videos can advise you on this best.

Running my fingers through it right out of the package, to detangle and fluff it, I noticed there was absolutely no shedding. When combing it, there was no shedding. I was quite shocked. My other blonde wig from Kryssma sheds LIKE CRAZY and already has huge bald spots in it after brushing it only 5 or 6 times since purchase.

I hope this wig won't be the same!!! To try to ensure against it, and because this wig is so much curlier, I'll try to only finger comb it.

history.title: Beautiful, but lightly pigmented.
history.text: The color is beautiful and it provides the perfect pop of brightness with a more neutral, smokey eye...BUT!  (You knew there was a but coming, right?)  It's not super pigmented and you have to go over it several times to get a good pop.  Since it's lighter, it's not ideal for a winged eye either.  I usually just flick it out on the edge a little, but don't do a full-on wing.  I'd say the color trends more toward violet (with red undertones), than purple (with blue). It doesn't bleed or run, and for the price, I think it's a good choice, if you're looking for a little spark with your eye make-up routine.

history.title: My skin seems to like this product...
history.text: I've only used this a few times so far, but so far, so good.  It does a great job removing make-up gently...including eye make-up.  Since it's oil based, I was worried it would break me out.  I'm 41, but my skin is very sensitive and I'm still prone to break-outs, particularly in my t-zone area.  Thankfully, so far, my skin seems to be liking this product.  I do think it's a little pricey for the size of the bottle you receive, but overall, I'm pleased.

target.title: Takes a lot of work to look good...
target.text:
3.5 stars

I have many thoughts on this wig. We ordered this to compliment my daughter's Mad Hatter Halloween costume and honestly, it looked like a hot mess when it arrived. The bangs were going everywhere, the curls were tangled, there was no part...it was awful.

My daughter, who is 12, has long, VERY thick blonde hair. When the wig arrived, we tried it on with her hair down to make sure it fit. It did. Fast forward to Halloween...I braided her hair and pulled it into a knot at the back of her head. Lo and behold, the wig wouldn't fit...it just kept sliding off her head. That was my mistake...I should have tested it with a bun when it arrived. Having said that, my daughter is incredibly petite...her doctor predicts she won't surpass 5' when she's full grown Obviously, her head isn't that large. My point? If you're an adult or are purchasing this for a teen or big child, it likely won't fit. I finally had to put her hair in a low bun at the nape of her neck to make it work.

Unfortunately, because her natural hair was so low, we couldn't do the up-do we had planned because her bun showed if we did. We ended up leaving it down, brushing it out, putting bobby pins in strategic places to help it frame her face and to contain it, and then I hair sprayed it in place. Styling was especially difficult because the wig is sparse. It's a lot of work to hide the netting underneath. The netting is a yellow-beige color and stands out like bright white against the purple and teal. We finally got it looking decent though, and she actually got many compliments on it throughout the evening, hence the higher star rating despite all the complaints.

Once the wig was brushed and styled, the waves looked beautiful. Just don't buy this expecting it to look great out of the box. It won't. It takes work.

history.title: Works nicely. I use it for dipping the whole finger
history.text: Works nicely. I use it for dipping the whole finger, because the angle is perfect but it also has a lip to let you do just a tip too. Lid is very secure. A little too secure haha.

history.text: What I have learned is that the black bottles are sheer, no matter how many coats you do. But the White bottles are amazing! So buy the newer white bottle versions.  How ever the black bottles can be use to give a Gelly Look!

target.title: Nice
target.text: This drill is damn near perfect. I use it on average of 3xs per day on clients. You can use it on the natural nail but keep a light touch. It is a powerful drill and the lowest setting is fine for shaping the nail and the contour.

fantastic value for fake hair. perfect color. True pale blonde platinum with white like highlights. Great if you bleach your hair!
Very soft. doesnt tangle. blends into your own hair very well. Easy to put on and off. Keep the bag and put them in it when not in use.
Make sure you straighten your own hair first before you put these in because these are SUPER straight!

Fantastic! I own the 22inch hair version as well. Both are great but the 22inch one can weight heavy on the head after 6 to 8 hours (and i suffer from migraines so I have to be careful about that) . this 17inch one is lighter but still VERY full. can wear it all day at work with no issues.
Very curly! very beautiful! Looks real!

history.title: Its okay. More gold then photo
history.text: More golden in color and it losses shape after a few wears

history.title: The lashes look beautiful but you'll never get them on
history.text: The magnet is strong. I bought the two paid sandwich style. I tried the videos, and the hacks that say cut them ...I tried applying with special lash tweezers... Nothing works to get them close to the lash lid. The magnetic is strong so I'm sure it won't fall off, but it's so strong that when you start to move the under lash toward your eye with the upper lash laying on top of your lashes, the magnetic pulls and moves is soil quickly that it always ends up locked half way through your natural lashes. And I'm a contact wearer...so it's not like I have  fear of putting stuff near my eyes. These probably will work well with lash liners. The lashes themselves look nicely constructed. It's just the application as intended is impossible.

history.title: Not that great. Underwhelmed.
history.text: There are better options out there. This had a weird part. The flesh color looks like layers of beige mesh for the scalp and it kind of shimmers like pantyhose? Super straight part so to fix your need alot of plucking but with that trange scalp material, I don't think it's worth it for me.  The scalp pokes out at the edges because there is not enough hair on top. Wefts are shown. Bangs are thin and would need alot of styling to look good.

history.title: Bought twice and neither was right color nor brand
history.text: So they came packed nicely but not in the s-noilite package. No logo. Just staples to a cardboard slip and wrapped in a pink bag. The hair feels nice. However, I bought the same one twice. First one was brassy in color. I was ordering the #60 in platinum. The thick version. Alot of hair. But totally brassy. So I saw the price drop so I was like okay I'll try again see if they get the color right. Nope. Still brassy and the second one was not the thick halo version. No more then 50grams. Both have double thick wires which don't hide well compared to other companies. The thin version they sent on the second ordee  had clips as well. Why doesn't the thick version have clips? It would help so the ends stay close to the head. The wire was also short. So not happy based on color, difference in style sent even though I ordered same style twiced, and not package from s-noilite. My seller was us fashion outlet. I'd be sceptical to purchase from them if they are the only seller.

history.title: Thought it was like flexible nail gel. No. It's a press on nail.
history.text: It's just a weak press on nail. Does not flex and form close to your own nail. Lifts very easily and will snag and pop off. Okay if you have maybe a photo shoot and your not a hand model. But don't expect to use your hand or nails without these popping off within mins of application.

history.title: Very flat top. Some fried pieces under the wig.
history.text: So I felt they did a good job of hiding the weft and had alot of hair. The unit shed pretty bad just by touching it though. The hair was shiney but powder should control that. The length was there. It had one spot near the bangs that looked like someone fried it. And that would be hard to conceal. The bangs looked nicer then most but it just wasn't for me. Fake scalp also not best I've seen but concealer would probably fix that. The top had no volume and I don't mean amount of hair. It was slicked down really tight. I tried to shake it a bit with my fingers to see if it would gain some life but it didn't, plus a bunch of hair fell out.  This super flat look near the fake scalp and with a mid part that cannot be moved is just gonna make me look like the Amish. I would look at this company again if they had a unit without the bangs and maybe a more flexible part. A mini front lace would probably help.

target.title: Better then most at this price point, depends on which one you get
target.text: So it's honestly not bad at this price point. It sheds a bit but all units have some shedding. For the mix brown I give 4 stars.The face front is about 2 inches and is meant to be cut and plucked for a natural look. I did neither in the photo. I just folded it under the the front as I'm afraid that cutting will make it look lifted in the front and obviously show it's a wig without some glue to put it down. The color is not exactly what I wanted. I was hoping it would be a darker brown. It's kinda a mousey brown and alittle strange in my opinion. It will need to be restyle in the front as some waves/curls flattened out by how it was packed in transport. The part is both a plastic fake skin and a mesh on top. You can see the mesh upon close examination. Makeup might help to conceal this.... Or make it worse. What I did like was the fullness and length. The weft was not too easy to be seen even when pulling hair apart. This is good compared to other brands where the wefts are often very visible, especially in the back and crown of a unit. Because the simulated scalp is narrow, you won't be able to change the part. It's also a bit flat near the part so it's gonna take some work to give a bit of volume. I would have enjoyed this much more had the color been a rich brown and if the scalp was a bit more realistic. Would I wear in public? Probably not. Would this be good for photo shoots or costumes ? yes. Would I buy other colors from this brand? Yes and I haven't done that with other brands on Amazon. For the purple ombre: I give 3 stars. It doesn't have the lace in front. This is more pure costume. The black is very shiney and the front of wig where the part is shows a bit of the black backing for construction. If it laid more flat and had the lace I would have given the purple ombre 4 stars. Dull the shiney with some powder like dry shampoo or maybe even dark eyeshadow. The fake scalp is actually better on the purple ombre compared to the brown mix. The ombre for the blonde is also a 4 star. Hair at the crown is a bit flat but the rest of the style is beautiful. The brown to blonde has the 2 inch lace like the long brown one. It's not as full on the head but you don't see the wefts unless you pull it apart a bit.  I feel the color is much more realistic. Hair feels pretty good for a synthetic. Note if you play too much , it will get a knotty feel. Again, good for photos. Some people might actually wear it daily but I don't know if it took take daily abuse. Length is great.

history.title: Great Gel polish and great colors!
history.text: So far I have tried 2 of these gel polishes and love both of them so I expect that to be the case on the rest of the colors.  They cover very well...even with just the first coat (although I still use 2 coats). It lasts a good two weeks which is the reason I use gel polish.  I use the Sally Hansen gel base coat and the Sensationail top coat which can also serve as a base coat but if I use it as a base coat, the polish doesn't cover as well and it's also harder to get it off.  It took a while to get this item since it came from China but I was in no rush.

history.title: Great fashion tape
history.text: Great tape..I have fibromyalgia and can't wear a bra as they are all way too uncomfortable for me.  To remedy this, I wear a camisole with sew-in bras but instead of sewing them in, I use this tape to hold them in place.  It works great!

history.title: NEW FORMULA
history.text: Extends, lifts & nourishes lashes. Gentle, buildable formula intensifies & defines lashes with a brush that is made from 100% plant-derived bristles. history.title: NO SILICONES - NO SULFATES

It contains nourishing, therapeutic, medicinal herbs (amla, holy basil, shikakai, bhringaraj, brahmi, neem & reetha). (Made in India according to tradition. Quality tested in Germany.) The online price is a little cheaper. I haven't used them on my eyes; only on my face. I'm happy to report that I haven't experienced any adverse reaction; no burning, no stinging, no redness. I used to do my own nails but got tired of having to wait for the polish to dry especially when in a hurry. These you can put a drop or so of glue and they stay on without damaging your nails. I wear gloves when I do the dishes and clean so they last long. I get compliments all of the time.

history.title: Great Inexpensive Serum
history.text:
I've been using this serum twice a week for the last 3 weeks and my skin feels great.
Almost immediately after putting it on my pores become visibly smaller. The discoloration and redness on my cheeks and forehead are much less visible in the morning if I use it at night.
This serum works just as well as the high-end ones and is at a much more reasonable price.
I'm definitely recommending this brand to all my friends.

history.title: Great Budget Friendly Palette
history.text:
This palette doesn't have all the qualities of a high end eyeshadow palette, but it is one of the best low cost palettes I've gotten before.
I love the range and variety of colors in this palette. All of the shimmers are highly pigmented and the matted come out great on the eye. The more vibrant shimmers do have a lot of fallout so I'd suggest using a shadow shield or doing your foundation and concealer after so you can cover it up. Also I would highly recommend using your finger or a sponge tip brush to apply the shimmers and pack on the color.

history.title: Cute and Glittery
history.text: These masks are really cute and glittery. They're perfect for a fun girl's night and really pull everything out of your pores, but I'm not the biggest fan of the scents. The strawberry cupcake one is okay, but the other two smell like child's medicine. It doesn't linger once the mask is applied and starts drying so it doesn't bother me too much. Just keep it in mind if you're very sensitive to smells.

history.title: Easy ombre lip
history.text: I wouldn't call these tints since they aren't the most long lasting, but they are still pretty nevertheless. I would recommend applying a lip balm before applying the ombre tint because it'll make it so much easier. All of the colors are very pretty & unique from one another. I didn't get any repeats.

history.title: Super cute & pigmented tints
history.text: I love collecting lip products in adorable packaging & I also love lip tints so these cute little cones are a match made in heaven for me. The packaging feels sturdy & secure so I'm pretty sure these won't leak in my purse. The tints themselves are long lasting & very pigmented. I still have some stains from where I swatched them 😅 They were all packed in a small bubble mailer with super pretty gold confetti which was a nice touch.  They also included two stickers (a starfish & a sea turtle) which is super nice of them. If I see anything else from this seller that I like then I'll definitely buy it.

history.title: Super cute & pigmented
history.text: I love the bright bubble gum pink that most color changing lip products turn in to & I love cute makeup packaging so I knew I love these. One of them did  leak a bit in transit, but luckily nothing else I bought was stained. All 3 are the same shade of pink so don't get these expecting 3 different colors. They are very moisturizing & the color is long lasting. They have a light floral scent, but it isn't noticeable once you put it on. I don't mind fragrances in lip products so it doesn't bother me.

target.title: So cute 😍
target.text: I'll be honest, I mainly bought these because of how adorable these are. I love macarons & these look just like them. The containers are secure & feel sturdy, but are also lightweight. The lip balms are really nice & have a jelly like texture. They aren't as moisturizing are Laneige or Vaseline lip balms, but I like that they aren't super thick because they work well under lipstick without messing it up like other lip balms do sometimes. They all smell amazing. The pink one (strawberry I think) is definitely my favorite. Once I'm done with the lip balms I'm definitely keeping the containers to use for other things.

history.title: A wide assortment of grooming tools
history.text: Twice a year, I send a pretty big package overseas to a soldier that is assigned to me that I "adopt". I always send over a manicure set but upon opening this, I found it to be much more. I think this would be closer to a grooming kit then just a manicure kit because you can do your hands, nails, and there are also tools to do your face and eyebrows. The case has a durable interior shell with a padded exterior and a click, push-in lock. Along with the case, this would make a nice stocking stuffer, small gift, or something to add to your kid's college bound supplies. ***Warning: There are some VERY sharp tools in this case that could be considered as a weapon. Keep out of reach of children.***

history.title: Clips, clips, and more clips!
history.text: Wow! Does this come with a lot of clips or what?!? Not only did this come with 2 bags of clips with every color of the rainbow but it came with barrettes, too!! They first thought I had was they were going to fall apart easy because that is the only explanation to me as to why they would give so many for this price but not one has done anything at all then exactly what they are expected to do!! They also don't pull my baby's hair out which is a major plus!

target.title: A spa treatment for my face, daily!
target.text: I have recently begun noticing those fine lines around the eyes that every woman and possibly many men dread. I have been using different serums and another, more invasive roller on my eyes this past month and I have been seeing some nice results. Like I said though, the other roller I use is a bit invasive in that it has little prickly points on it and open up the pores. I can't use it daily because my skin is sensitive and I heard about this roller being much more gentle on the skin. I don't want to give up my other roller but I think paired with this roller, I get more coverage and special treatment to these lines and the rest of my face to prevent future lines. My skin is much smoother, softer, and resilient now that I have added this roller to my regimen as well.

history.title: TOO FACED DEVOTEE
history.text: This is the most used palette in my makeup wardrobe. I usually use it for a professional everyday look for work. However , it is versatile enough that I can intensify it for evening or dressy occasions or tone it down for subtly enhancing a "no makeup" look. Because it is neutral and universally flattering on almost all skin tones (may not show up well if you have a deep toned complexion), I can wear it with any color in my wardrobe. I also like that it has a fantastic cool toned set of colors that do not end up showing up blue or purple on the skin. The undertones are very subtle, just like real skin! So hard to find - there seems to be a profusion of warm toned makeup out there, but very little cool or neutral toned makeup that produces a smooth, natural looking and flattering gradient of color on the skin. Nice job, Too Faced! I hope you regard this as your flagship palette and never discontinue this. Don't change the formula either!

history.title: STOP LOOKING FOR THE BEST POWDER - YOU JUST FOUND IT!
history.text: They call it BAKING, I call it MY BABY!! it's a crease-less must have. I have two one in my makeup kit and one in my personal makeup bag. This baby is amazing work so well for all over the face, but best of your under eyes... love it. I cannot live without this product!! No Flashback either!  Charlotte T can we be BESTIES??

history.title: LOVE!!!
history.text: we go everywhere together these days! she erases shine, doesn't make my super-fair complexion orange, and my skin look nearly flawless.  i thought the translucent pressed powder was lovely...but that pales in comparison now. hands down THE best powder i've ever purchased.  ...but if you're pasty & tasty with a shiny t-zone--buy some! get two!

target.title: I LOVE THESE!
target.text: These shadows are so lush!  So smooth and pigmented, plus they last. I love all the shades and it is the perfect warm yellow toned gold, yet it also is very skin-toned, if that makes sense (really blends into your overall look and makes you glow). I use this shade as a wash across my lids and use bronzer in the crease (the perfect everyday look). This eyeshadow also goes perfectly with my light/medium complexion.  One thing to watch for, these shadows are designed to pop out from the case (from the bottom), so you can place them in a palette. They also don’t take drops well (will shatter) so be carful and gentle with them.

history.title: Love that they're all-natural
history.text: I try to only use all-natural products when it comes to putting stuff off my skin, so I was always afraid to try bathtub products such as bath bombs until I saw that these are indeed all-natural! The storage box they come in is nice and the bath bombs are individually wrapped. This makes them perfect for gift giving if you choose to do so. As soon as I removed the lid, the aroma instantly hit me and it was wonderful. Each one smells unique and lovely. They are larger than golf balls but smaller than tennis balls, so they are pretty good size. I love that they contain epsom salts as well, which is perfect for my sore muscles after a long day at work. I don't take baths often, but when I do, I love tossing one of these natural bath bombs in and just relaxing in it. I didn't have any problem with these staining the tub, which is also a pro. Truly love these!

history.title: Lightweight & cute
history.text: I want to begin by stating I have only had this dryer a week and so far I like it. It isn't very large but it's not exactly tiny travel size so it's in the middle somewhere. I would say that it is practical enough to travel with. I like that it isn't too heavy and it is simple to use. It has low & high speeds and it it has cool, warm, & hot temperature settings. The 360 degree swivel cord is convenient & makes it easy to move the dryer around without the cord getting twisted. The only reason I took away a star is due to cosmetic reasons & not functionality. There are a couple spots where the pink paint is chipped & white is showing from underneath (illustrated in my photos). Other than that, I am happy with this dryer so far. If anything were to change, I will update my review accordingly.

target.title: Not human hair.. Way different from actual picture in the description
target.text:
[[VIDEOID:2b2157ba2fd784356c925f8ac3c0e6b4]] This is my honest review about this product..
First off this hair is not human hair. Why? Feels like plastic but i receive it with some sort of curls, it’s like those curly synthetic hair that once you comb it out and the curl is gone you can’t get it back..

The first picture is when I took the hair straight from the bag on to the mannequin head, that’s how it looks, I then decided to comb the hair and it just gets worse, I then decided to use my magic brush and gets more worse.. I spritz some conditioner and water on the hair and that did not make any difference.

Everyone knows this..
When you use conditioner and water on curly human hair it’s gets more curly but that wasn’t the case for this hair.. and I know this for sure because I have bought more than 5 curly human hair wigs on Amazon and all of them feat curly with water or conditioner.

Now, this is definitely not the wig in the pictures.
Most of these sellers on amazon takes pictures from those professionals stylists on Instagram and use it to sell their products.

The color is far from the one in the picture.

In the video, that’s after the hair is being washed, and you can see I’m spraying water on it and nothings happen.. Doesn’t even change it form. The hair strand is very course as well.

I wanted to use a flat iron to do the burn test but I did not since it was clear this hair is not human hair..

I have kinky curl wigs that would put this wig to shame with just water.

history.title: These are magical for fixing makeup mishaps without having to start  over
history.text:
May made my second purchase of these in so impressed with them

This is just the thing I've been looking for!! These presoaked makeup corrector are perfect for eye makeup gone stay. Sometimes, I'll do my eyebrows outside of the shape I intended, or I'm too impatient to let my eyeliner or Mascara dry before moving on (I use Clinical gel liner which is hard to remove under any circumstances) These magic little wands are small enough to correct your mistakes and not disturb your other makeup. And for a pack of 3 jars.... You can't beat the price! You won't find me without them ever again!

history.title: Amazing assortment of bright,  pigmented,  easily blended metallic shadows that stay on throughout the day
history.text: Wow.... You talking do get a ban my foot your buck. This palette has every color you could possibly want. I bought this because I had no metallic eyeshadow in my beauty arsenal and I figured this would be a great way to check it out. The colors are nicely pigmented and bright,  blend easily and stay on (I do use an eyeshadow primer and setting spray) I do NOT use the cheap brushes that come with it but an actual makeup brush set. The only con is you do get a lot of fall out from most of the shadows. I would definitely recommend.... It's a great value that goes well beyond the price

history.title: The next liquid Highlighter I now have in my arsenal
history.text:
I love highlighters... Especially liquid ones. I ordered my first powdered Highlighter when I got this. This is one of the better liquid highlights I have (and I have a nice collection) I was unsure of it at first because of the color and consistency. It looked like it would just blend into my skin like a very thin lotion leaving no color behind. Since I was going to use my new powder Highlighter. I applied this after my primer, under my foundation and to my surprise it left A VERY nice glow(no glitter or sparkle) that peeked through my foundation making my skin look 10 yrs younger. After stopping on some of the powder. I used this liquid in the inner corner of my eyes, cupid's bow, around my eyebrows, and just the finest bit at the very peek of my cheekbones. The end result was so eye catching and naturally beautiful that I couldn't believe it
... I felt like a whole new woman. I even used it in the very center of my lips to accentuate my Ombre lip look. When my fiancee got home that night, he complimented me on how my skin looked (unprompted) and asked what I had used that day. This is great for the pricr
.. I like it better than my $25 Highlighter and would recommend to anyone

history.title: Really an amazingly beautiful headband
history.text: Wow.. What a beautiful headband.. Especially for the price. I love that it goes all the way around my head without fitting  too tight. I'm 37signals this headband is perfect for my age ...not too young but takes a regular bun day and turns my hair into a compliment catching mess lol. All the stones are very sturdy in the headband, it came in perfect condition and I absolutely love it

target.title: I was definitely surprised by the quality of this Palette (in a good way)
target.text: Wow.. I was seriously taken back by this Palette. I usually don't buy Eyeshadow this inexpensive but I liked the soft glittery colors and figures if nothing else, I'd have something to give my eyes a little pop when I don't want to go all matte... But the quality of this Palette is actually very good. I can't believe how smooth, pigmented blendable, and the staying power of this for such a steal. Is course though I did use Shadow printer first. I used 4 colors from this Palette for this look. The light purple as one of my transitions, the copper as a crease, and the light blue add an insert corner and Brow highlighter. I think I only used 2 other shadows from other Palettes. This is just gorgeous and I'm glad I bought it after 2 weeks of mulling it over .lol. I will definitely be buying many more W7 palettes. Why spend $60 at Sephora when I can spend 10 or less and still very quality product?

history.title: I've been spending $12 for one lipstick something like this on a cancer site
history.text:
OMG! I'm 61 + sure wish there would have had ANYTHING close to this. This is heaven. I've been spending $12 for one lipstick something like this on a cancer site. It's very drying so on the other end there's another lip applying thing to put a goopy, never drying gloss over it. Then after about an hr, your lips look cracked, even if not.

I received this today. I can't explain it but to have something on my lips whenever seeing myself in a mirror is a 1st. I know I'm also a 'lip licker', which doesn't help, but this is actually stopping some of the licking.

The colors are true to what's seen in the tubes. I'm a klutz using lipsticks like this anyway. The sponge on a stick. And now must be EXTRA careful applying it because it's the opposite problem now. If it goes where you don't want it, the only way to get it off is with something oil based. I may experiment + see if I can find thin enough lipstick brushes to apply it.
Please try this if you want your lipstick seen. If you want pigment.
I can't wait till the hubby gets home from work.
But I absolutely love these + what a gr8 deal. the majority of the colors are usable.

history.title: Meet my new best friend!
history.text:
OMFG this brush is amazing! I have 3B style curls and I'm also biracial so my hair is really porous and a bit on the fragile side. In its curly state it's a pain to care for but the traditional blow dry and flat iron method is both tedious and damaging to my hair.

When wet to straight irons came out, I immediately hopped on board because it just made more sense that heating my hair while wet would be less damaging to it. Through this I got hooked lol. But even with that it is a bit tedious.... though it did help me figure out that I could flat iron my hair dry and skip the blow dryer.

My boyfriend has one of these brushes and I tried it as a quick way to straighten my hair in the am. I was SUPER impressed! But it had some design flaws that made me seek my own, and landed me here.

From what I've seen comparing this brush to the more popular Rinfy and his brush, they've reallly improved upon the original design concepts. Most notably, the buttons are on the front of the handle and not the sides, down near the cord instead of anywhere up near the head. This along with the way they're shaped to be concaved makes it highly unlikely they'll be pressed by accident. But even if you do press them by accident, the device automatically locks them about 30s after the temperature is set. If you want to change the temp or turn it off after that, you need to click the power button twice to unlock them.

The teeth are not only steep enough to accommodate my thick hair, but there's also way more of them packed more densely together. This seems to make this brush MUCH quicker at straightening my hair, and it can also get it board straight. The other brushes have only gotten it as close as a little wave.

Since my hair is so thick, I also have to place my hand on the bristles while I pull the brush through so it gets all my hair in it. This is the only model I've tried which hasn't burned me even once while using it so far. The teeth are so densely packed that there is no way for a finger or the side of my hand to slip down past the safety portion of it.

Quick heating? Honestly I don't know why anyone tries to claim that.... I've never seen any heated hair product heat up quickly. My stove doesn't even heat up quickly. I hardly expect my straightening iron or brush to defy the laws of physics so I don't have to wait a few minutes for it to heat up. That's why I turn it on BEFORE I'm ready to use it. 😉

All joking aside though, this really is a fantastic brush. It even FEELS high quality. Nice weight, premium plastics, slick design. It will fit right in with other hair devices no matter how pricey they are.

target.title: great color selection & decent quality
target.text: These were kind of too cheap for me to pass by! The variety of colours is perfect, and they are full-sized scrunchies with plenty of fabric to make them puffy. They all have silver dots printed on them, and I can guess the silver paint will rub off over time and make them not look so pretty any more. Even with that factored in, though, it's worth it at this price. It's nice to have scrunchies you don't have to worry about losing! lol

history.title: Pretty and Durable!
history.text:
So way too much hair for me but I clipped off about 4 in so I could work it into my hair. Here's the hot tip, take a plastic bristle brush and lightly come through at first. The only drawback is you have to pin it carefully because the elastic band is white and will show through if you're not careful. Color is very nice.

UPDATE: September 12, 2020
Since this thing is so long and I only use a portion at a time I'm still using the first portion and it holds that remarkably well if you care for it properly. Liked it so much that when I altered my hair color I bought another one! I really like these a lot and the price is right!

My only criticism is that the part isn't 'natural' looking as advertised, nor does the part look like the one in the photo. It does have the typical synthetic wig part, bunched tight at the part. Other than that though I really do love it. It's cold where I live so I currently where it under my knit caps, and it's great because it's nice and light not thick and cumbersome like a full cap wig. It's going to be perfect for summer time!

history.title: Same as the non-waterproof version
history.text: Honestly, I absolutely LOVE DollyWink Liquid Eyeliners and have been using them for years! The only reason I took off a star is because I don't see the difference between this one and the other super black one. Waterproof? The staying power in the original one was long lasting already, so I thought this one would be even more durable. Nope. Same lasting power. Same super black color. Same super fine application. Don't get me wrong, DollyWink is literally my favorite eyeliner. But this is EXACTLY the same as the non-waterproof one, which is actually cheaper. I basically bought the same eyeliner for a higher price and different color packaging.

history.title: Perfect.
history.text:
My brush did not come in a box like some pictures show, just in a plastic container. I used it today for the first time. Now, let me tell you, it takes me a while to know if I like a brush or not. To get used to it. I have some very good brushes but this one just beat them all! I love it! It is my definitely favorite brush! It's very high quality, holds its shape perfectly, acrylic doesn't get stuck in it.. It is by far the best brush I've ever used. I will recommend it to all my nail tech friends and will get a bunch of them as soon as I can just to make sure I'm good on brushes. And in case they quit selling them.

By the way, the fact that it's short is a plus in my book. That way I'm not worried that I'm gonna get it in my customer's eye when I'm brushing the acrylic back to the cuticle area. And it fits perfectly in my hand.

history.title: Best powder ever!
history.text: This holographic powder is amazing! Whoever says it doesn't work is probably not doing it right. If you rub it with an eyeshadow applicator over a NO WIPE top coat, it works and looks amazing!

target.title: Not 18 ml!
target.text: I put an orange wood stick in to check the fullness. Just under half of the bottle. And keep in mind that orange wood sticks are pretty thick, so it pushed some of the polish up, too. So a third at best.

target.title: YouTube Wig Review COMING SOON!
target.text: I will be the first buyer to post pictures for this BOMB wig! It is the softest human hair wig that I have EVER purchased and it is really cut EXACTLY like the picture. For you to actually get the look that is shown in the picture you will have to flat iron the wig when first taking the wig out of the package. Other than that, the wig is very easy to maintain and the knots are really UNNOTICEABLE! I will be using this wig to make my first wig review on my YouTube channel "BeYOUtiful Shae" please subscribe to my channel to view the full video as I share all of the details about this amazing wig, that video will be uploaded on 01/25/2017. I highly recommend that many of my subscribers and buyers purchase from this company and seller. I will be purchasing many more wigs with this company to review on my YouTube channel. Thanks so much for the best customer experience!

Would be an ideal set for a child's first real manicure set.  At least the blades are sharp.  They are a little hard to hold onto, at least for my larger (for a woman) hands.  However, they will fit nicely into my portable manicure kit!  Pretty colors, for sure.  Shipping was SLOW.  Product arrived six days AFTER last estimated delivery date.  Arrived wrapped in ~50 layers of thin, plastic, food-type, plastic wrap and a thin, card stock box.  If I like them more as I use them I will revise my review.

history.title: So far , it's lovely..~!~
history.text:
I'm going to state right off the bat this is well worth it..I add to any cream { it is truly improving my skin }..I
started mixing this at first to a nice cream at night..After a few weeks of mixing face cream w/oil, I've started to use just oil a couple of days on face and neck , and I'm really impressed.

Update 6/9/2013 : I purchased this in March , I'm very happy I did , Love the scent..I'm pleased to say I can feel , and see the difference in my skin..I must state that I'm also using flax seed oil , but I use one oil , morning and night , then the other..I've taken care of my skin the best always , and never suffered too much acne..but for some reason blackheads around my nose crease { hung in there } were difficult to get rid of , this caused whiteheads to appear also...After more than 6-8 weeks of using this I no longer have the blackheads around nose , { a few clinking to the tip , but fading } and the whiteheads are getting smaller and disappearing...I use this both with a face cream , and by itself..Both ways work well..~!~

Will for sure be buying more , this oil lasts too , and it goes into skin, without waste..This will last me at least another 3-4 months..~!~

history.title: Perfect , absolutely worth the purchase ~

So I needed everything brand new , I need new brushes . and I bought a set of 6 from Too Faced  { including a kabuki  ,separate purchase } This brush is so soft , no loose hairs , excellent length and no smell ~ love the feel in my hand , total control  , it is every bit as good , if not better than those other I bought ~  super fast shipping , got it today .  I ordered it on July 27th , how fantastic is that ~ Awesome seller ~ So very pleased , Thank You ~ /=^} ~

history.title: LOOKING FOR A STRAWBERRY BLONDE UNIT THIS IS FOR YOU
history.text:
I finally found a blonde that matches my skin tone perfectly. Most were too light colored (Platinum Blonde). However, it is NOT the same blonde that is in the photo. The color is more of a Strawberry Blonde it has a reddish tint more than the platinum Ice or White blonde that you see in the photo. However this Company "Alice" has that Ice blonde or White blonde you will have to do a search, it costs around $40. I do recommend it and will most definitely purchase it again. The hair is super soft and it does tangle which is why I took one star off of the rating. This synthetic unit is very similar to human hair. I used a straightening brush for a smoother finish because I cut the hair.
UPDATE: I have been wearing this Wig for 4 weeks now and it's still holding up just fine. This is Unbelievable considering the price and it being synthetic hair😉👍 After washing this wig goes right back to it's original texture, but you may want to use a straightening brush after the wig is fully dry. Btw I did allow it to air dry. I do not use a blow dryer on my Units because they last a lot longer by allowing them to air dry naturally☺👍
Good Luck Ladies...

history.title: Can't see the ingredients but I like 'em
history.text: This is a fluffy, thick, buttery white cream in a plain white plastic jar. The bottom of the jar has an unfitting sticker that says Best Neck Firming Cream, 2 oz. With Hyaluronic Acid, Coenzyme (CoQ10), Licorice, Vitamin C, and other ingredients which appear to be scribbled out. The writing on the sides of the jars is ridiculously small and the words are blurred to the point where they are unreadable.I can read the directions (apply to face and neck) but I dislike being unable to read the ingredients and manufacturing information. As far as the product itself goes, this is a terrific basic tightening/softening cream. Its texture reminds me of Desitin Diaper Rash Ointment (and it smells a bit like Desitin), but it does get absorbed into skin.  The first time I applied this, I generously "coated" my neck, and once coated, this becomes a soft of collar of skin smoothers and plumpers. If you don't mind the packaging this is a good buy.

history.title: Best ever - nothing beats this stuff
history.text: It smells wonderful, keeps me dry, and it's gentle on my skin.  It never stains, and I need only two squirts a day.  I love this deodorant, and I'm glad I can buy 3 cans at once.

target.title: Excellent - gentle and effective but...
target.text: This works exceptionally well for an aluminum-free alternative.  Most of the time, I will use Nivea antiperspirant once or twice a week, and supplement it with this deodorant. Antiperspirant seems to last through washes, so I don't need to apply it every day.  I don't have the kind of body that can go with using only deodorant, and often times even antiperspirant fails.  This Nivea deodorant really does work for getting rid of odor, and because it dried in the armpit, it seems to make a seal that stops sweat a bit.  One word of warning...this deodorant has a REALLY STRONG scent.  If you are bothered by fragrances, you may not like this at all.  It definitely clashes with perfume for a few hours of wear, and if applied at night, I found the fragrance to be annoying and it game me a headache. There are other aluminum-free Nivea formula with different fragrances that I'm going to try to see if their perfume is less pungent. Also - it smells like "deodorant" even though it's a fresh scent.  Anybody near to me could be thinking "Wow, she wears a lot of deodorant."
