The bottom color of the hair is very blonde so you will have to tone it down with a light brown rinse. If you are looking for curly hair, look for the kinky curly in two tone .

history.title: Doesn't leave marks on clothes!
history.text: This makeup is crazy.  It comes out of the bottle looking like a white colored moisturizer.  When applied to the face, it immediately begins to blend with the color of the skin right before your eyes.  It has somewhat of a weird smell if you put your nose up to the bottle.  I didn't notice it once I applied or throughout the day.  This makeup does not come off onto your clothes like regular foundation.  It comes off the same way it went on.  When applying it, it goes on more like moisturizer then makeup.  Its got SPF in it so it takes an extra swipe or two to get it to completely blend in but when it does its so lightweight, you don't even notice its there. It just leaves your skin feeling soft and smooth.  Oh and you don't get that later in the day shiney look with this makeup.  It really is pretty cool stuff!

history.title: Colour Changing Foundation
history.text: This foundation is like no other foundation.  It is definitely not your average foundation.  It blends in almost immediately with your own skin color because of this, it never looks caked on or leaves makeup lines around the jawline.  It has an SPF coverage of 15 which is a nice added bonus.  The foundation seems to leave a nice cross between matte and dewy while minimizing the pores.  It is much more moisturizing then the average foundation also.  My skin used to be on the dryer side and now I have normal skin thanks to this product.

history.title: Immediately see the difference...
history.text:
This under eye cream is amazing. The first time I used it, I could immediately see the difference. It says you must apply it and wait expressionless for the 2 minutes after but I didn't even have to wait two minutes to see that there was a noticeable difference.
Its easy to use, you just clip the plastic tip off and apply. There isn't a noticeable scent and the texture is soft and goes on smoothly but seems to soak in more abruptly then other eye creams. When I say abruptly, I mean it kind of almost begins to feel chalky or glue-ish when it begins to soak in. It leaves the skin feeling soft and smooth for the entire day.
I did notice that there isn't much for directions as to how often to apply it.

history.title: Makeup concealer
history.text:
This 3 pack of cream concealer is well, very concealing! Its thick and maybe that is why it is a challenge to get out of the twist tube every time. I felt as though I was twisting forever before anything came out and then when it finally did, it wouldn't stop! It was like an explosion of concealer and it unfortunately seems to do this with every use. With this concealer, you don't need much of it or it will begin to looked 'caked on". I would recommend getting a small container ready to put the extra in before beginning to use it.
Because of the 3 pack, you can blend them to match almost any skin tone which is a great feature. The clear containers also is a great feature too!

history.title: Lightweight Primer
history.text: I was surprised by how lightweight this primer is.  The texture reminds me of a light moisturizer which is different.  I also like that I can build it up for more coverage so on days when I don't need as much, I don't use as much and vise versa!  it is a nice change of pace.  It doesnt have a smell that I noticed at all or much of a color to it so it won't stain anything if you have an accident.  It did seem to 'hold' my makeup on well throughout the day into the early evening.  Although I am used to primers that have more of a pore minimizing effect to them, this is still a good value for the money.

history.title: Immediate Results...
history.text:
The wintertime is so drying & my dad hands tend to get such bad dry skin that it cracks, exposing painful lesions all over.
We both started using it the first day it arrived. Much to both of our surprises, it immediately began showing noticeable results on the first application. When I say immediate, I mean right after we applied it our skin was much softer. It wasn't that noticeable on the areas that were already healthy and soft. The areas with cracked or excessively dry skin were immediately transformed into soft and moisturized skin. It feels kind of tingly and minty going on also.
As far as the smell goes, its not noticeable unless you are trying to smell it which I probably wouldn't because what I can smell of it, I didn't really hate it but I definitely wasn't into it either. It's a strange rusted orange color but does not leave stains on anything because it soaks into fabric/clothes just as regular lotion does. The texture is a nice, thick one but considering, it soaks into the skin fairly fast. Actually quicker then most other thick creams used for this purpose.

history.title: Fast & Effective...
history.text:
I purchased these body wax strips and began using them only a few days after letting my hair grow out. I didn't think it would be long enough because I could barely see it with a lighted mirror but it was. It took a lot less time then I assumed it would and it didn't hurt much at all. The results were better then I had imagined. My skin was left soft and smooth. It took me 30 minutes my first time using them on my face and decollate area. They are very easy to cut into smaller pieces with a regular kitchen scissors but make sure to clean it off with soap and water afterwards.
Things to remember when using...really get the wax warm before applying (I used a space heater set on low instead of warming the wax in my hands for 30 seconds prior to using). It will help the wax grip to the hair better so you will get better results. When pulling the paper off of skin, always pull up and not out against the way the hair is growing. Use one hand to hold the skin taught before pulling up on the paper. This will also help you get more effective results.

history.title: Excellent led lamp and kid safe

Really good led lamp.

Has cured everything I've thrown at it, builder gel, poly gel, gel polish, foil adhesive, stick it (gem adhesive)

The one thing that really sets this lamp apart from all the other ones I've purchased previously though is the low heat 90 sec cure. My 5 year old loves nails and nail art but she's of course very sensitive to heat like all little kids which meant no gels or foils and having to use nail glue that doesn't hold for gems. She can use this lamp it doesn't bother her at all. I'm really enjoying being able to do gels and foils with her this lamp is awesome.

I have a particular polygel I've not used much myself because it cures super hot and I can cure it in this one too... All lamps should have this function

history.title: Don’t hesitate on this one.
history.text: I bought this to use on a few sparse patches in my lashes as well as on my brows. I follow the instructions to a t, applying only at night onto clean lash/brow hair and allow to dry completely before going to bed. The results are excellent. Within a week, most of the sparse patches in my lashes had begun to fill. Within two weeks, the short lashes were almost the same length as all the others. I am noticing longer existing lashes that are less prone to breakage and new growth in my brows as well. I have very sensitive skin and have a ridiculous amount of allergies to product ingredients and this has caused zero issues for me. I will definitely be repurchasing.

history.title: Wonderful, but use with caution.
history.text:
I got this as a replacement for another roller I purchased on Amazon that broke. I really wanted a kit that included multiple heads, particularly a more narrow one that I could use on the sides of and crevices next to my nose as my skin is very dry there and this tool helps immensely with product absorption.

Pros:
1. The heads are very easily interchangeable, but twist them gently on and off as I understand the heads could easily get stuck on the handle and then you’re left only being able to use the one.
2. The silicon cleansing head is exactly what I wanted. Gentle enough for every day use, but still does a great job at getting a deeper clean and prepping skin for dermal rolling.
3. The added sanitation tray and instructions for cleaning are very helpful. I appreciate that this company wants to ensure customers know how to use the product safely.
4. The device came vacuum sealed in plastic ensuring no contamination occurred after packaging.
5. The needles are sturdy and an appropriate length for at home use. Anything longer or wider increases risk for infection and should not be used by non-professionals.
6. The metal ice roller attachment worked well at relieving tension and pressure. As someone who experiences migraines, this was a huge plus. It also helped reduce puffiness and inflammation, especially after using the needle heads, and added an extra soothing element used over sheetmasks and seemed to improve absorption of the essence in the mask.

Cons:
1. My only real concern is the small, circular head that is for “topical skin.” The needles on this attachment are longer and can easily puncture the skin more than intended. Even using very gently, I felt this attachment puncture into the deeper levels of my dermis and that did cause some concern for me. I took one star off for this reason. I have decided to only use this attachment on blemishes to increase absorption of acne treatment products and only after 5-7 minutes of soaking in 90% isopropyl alcohol. I would absolutely never use this on more delicate or thinner skinned areas like the under eye, brow bone, forehead, or nasolabial folds.

All in all, I am very happy with this product and would highly recommend it.

target.title: Like!
target.text: Like everyone else, I was so not a fan of the face wash. It left my skin feeling squeaky clean (in a bad way) and coated with residue. However I LOOOVE the essence and serum. I’ll probably purchase the full sizes of those three products.

history.title: Worked Well for Me!
history.text: There are several professional piercing parlors near me, but for some reason, I never seemed to get to one, and I very much wanted my ears pierced. I finally bought these piercing guns, and within two minutes, my ears were pierced. No problems whatsoever. They earrings are in now and my ears are healing well. I very much look forward to the time when I can wear my large earring collection. If you want something other than the lobe of the ear pierced, I would recommend a professional, but for the lobe, they are great!

history.title: Works for Me!
history.text: I have very long hair that's already thick. But today, most women want super-thick hair, luxurious hair, and I'm one of those women. This works well on my hair, leaving it feeling and looking even thicker and more luxurious than it already is. The cream can feel a bit tacky to the touch, but it's not at all tacky or sticky on the hair. Just apply to wet hair and dry and style as you usually do. I love this, and I'll be ordering more.

target.title: Works Quite Well, Love It!
target.text: My eyebrows, eyeliner, and lip color are permanent makeup. Not going to lie. However, there are times when even someone with permanent makeup needs a touch up, and eyebrows seem to require a touch up more than anything else. I love this tattoo pen for touch ups. The strokes applied really do look exactly like eyebrow hairs, and I found them easy to apply. The pen is like a felt-tip pen, so if you can use one of those, you can use this. Sometimes it seems as though the color doesn't want to come out. If that happens, just hold the pen with the applicator side down, and it will work fine. For me, at least, the product has been smudge-proof and lasts till I wash it off. (It is waterproof; you have to apply cleanser to remove it.) The color looks quite natural as well and blends with my real eyebrows and permanent makeup perfectly. This isn't just for people with permanent makeup, however. This is a wonderful tattoo pen for those with natural eyebrows who just want to fill them in a bit, make them fuller and more lush. (Haven't we all over-plucked or over-waxed?) Heavy eyebrows seem to be "in" right now, and if that's what you want, this tattoo pen will give them to you. The only minus I can find right now is that my color is not in stock. Highly recommended.

history.title: Soothing serum with a lightweight consistency
history.text:
*It's far too early to speak of the effectiveness of this product, so I will write about my first impressions*

The serum is a milky formula with a light yellow tint to it. It's lightweight and absorbs into the skin fairly quick, there is an odor, but it's not offensive and smells vaguely of honey. I've been using this for a few days now and I haven't noticed any irritation or clogged pores.

UPDATE: This serum ended up drying my skin out. This is not the fault of the serum, it's more of an issue with skin types I think. I have combination skin, and this seemed to aggravate my dryness issue. I haven't noticed any breakouts, or irritation though. It may work quite well for someone else, just not someone like me

history.title: Perfume that lacks staying power
history.text: This perfume was incredibly disappointing. The perfume says Peony clearly on the bottle, and yet, the bulk of what I smell is some strange artificial lily of the valley scent with a slight smoky smell. To make matters worse, the perfume lacks and sort of staying power. With in just an hour, the scent had COMPLETELY disappeared.  I was completely unsatisfied with this product

The shimmers are quite tame, so if you're not the sort that likes to signal mars from earth, then you'll like these shimmers, I think. They're subtle, very natural looking and pretty.  The packaging is standard, nothing remarkable or noteworthy here.  The shadows are long wearing and looked great the entire day.  In this selfie, I am wearing fresh peach and dry peach.

history.title: Good entry leve nail art printer.
history.text:
This is a great entry level nail art printer. The O2 nails app is easy to use and has a wonderful selection of options and designs. Which is always getting added to!
The printer is easy to set up, and easy to use.
The seller was very helpful and swift to respond to all communication!
The print quality is pretty good.
My only complaints are.that you may need to buy additional nail products to works with. It requires a print gel to print onto that hasnt been cured. Tjey do send you some products, but you may want to order more!
The print cartridge can be a bit fussy, so if it's not used daily, then it needs cleaned and a test run printed to clean it out before printing any nails.

history.title: Better than a perm any day..
history.text: I bought this product last year in 2014 at a local CVS pharmacy store. I like this product but I must warn African females (black) this product does leave a residue..so if you use this lotion daily..always brush your hair out. From the scalp to the ends...it reminds me of the "jerri curl" products from the 1980's. Over all my hair did not dry out and it stayed moisturized for atleast 2-3 before re-applying. If you use a pressing comb or hot curling iron dont mix this product with heat..if you desire a Donna Summers look this is perfect..

history.title: Michel Design works really does a body good
history.text: I purchased the Hummingbird scent and I currently own three scents from Michel.. The Peony is really a good scent and the scent is just wonderful. My Tutti Fruiti arrived today as well and the smell is another top favorite..

history.title: Finally sitting on the dock of the Bay..
history.text: What more can I say about my purchase of Greenwich Bay Trading bath bar set? First of all these soap sets were on my Wish-list for sometime. They arrived today and just like they are pictured...The big bar is truly huge..! Reminds me of a container of butter that you find in the super market. The scents are very nice and they arrived un broken or switched out due to a shortage in shipping. The larger bar I will use sometime next year and the smaller one will go in my soap bowl,that I plan on using this weekend.

history.title: A gift...in deed
history.text: I bought this bar of soap as a gift for my hair stylist and I have used Common Wealth bar soaps in the past. They normally keep them at hotels like Marriot,Hilton or other 3 star lodge's. I purchased  a Cotton,Pineapple from Amazon and the Sugar scented one's from their company website...The bars are really big and they last for more than a month or more. They make a wonderful gift and certain scent's have a special box that encases the soaps..

target.title: Taking a cruise...in the Hawaiian islands
target.text: I bought this bar as a Christmas gift for a relative..I have used this brand in the past. The packaging is rather fancy but the scents are so delicious . They remind me of cocktails they serve in the Hawaiian islands..The bars are a full size 10.5 oz and you can share these with a male spouse. Most male's tend to avoid scented soaps especially if they linger? To bad I didn't buy this one for myself but my cousin should enjoy this soap. Maybe she will return the favor and buy me the same brand? Lol

history.title: Not terrible it works but not as advertised
history.text: This remover is difficult to work with it’s a very thick gel. You need to shake the bottle very well before using and be patient. You should file nails really good first before using. You may need to apply and scrape more than once with nail tool. Three times for really stubborn gel polish. It didn’t “burst” as advertised at least not on my nails but it bubbles up and lifts the polish making it much easier and less time consuming than traditional removal with acetone soaking. It’s not a horrible product but could be improved. Worth trying definitely I am glad that it makes removal faster.

history.title: Very Soft!  Small bundles. Get two for med to big size head. 1 pack os enough for small heads.
history.text:
I received this shipment with In 2 days because of Prime Membership. When I first open the package, it appeared small to me. This has got to be the smallest I ever received. I assume that it was the way they packaged it. I was wrong. The bundles are small. Appear more when separated. I have a small head, so this 6 pack was barely enough for a nice full head. 1 order gives you 6 small packs. It is very soft hair though.

Edit:
So I bought A second pack. Look like you will have to buy 2 for a full head for any one with med to big head. Especially if you have a large head. If you are looking for a heat resistant hair to recurl, or straightened, this product is not for you. Lowest temperature I tried do far was 180. It burns/melt easily. Stick with the hot water (like other synthetics.) Other than that, it is a bit soft without having to do anything to it. Like other synthetics, it does frizz over time. No smells and it does go past the ears, touching the side of my jaw/tips touch shoulder.

All in all, nothing remarkable

history.title: Very nice!
history.text: This is very nice. I was hoping it would be more of a two tone than a mix. I wanted 1b ombre to 30. But it is a mix brown and black at the top making it appear brown instead. However, I do love the waves. It is gorgeous. The hair texture is softer than I expected. A huge plus. I dont like how much it sheds though.

Not a mix color of brown. I had no problems with the hair. It does frizz but I make it look more natural. I do like sperating the strand to have a fluffy look. However after the 1 week of wearing, it started to go back to it original tight curls. I either leave it or I seperate them again.

target.title: So far so good
target.text: I really enjoy this kit so far, although I just put the lashes on for the first time today. I love having a glue and bond in a single tube, because I always apply glue using the mini mascara wand and then apply another brush-applicator glue to the band before I apply and fuse. This glue is less sticky than my favorite Calailis glue, so it’s definitely easier to work with. I don’t know yet how it’s going to hold up. The lashes themselves are beautiful, very similar to the Easitension lashes which are great beginner lashes since they are so easy to apply.  I love the wand on the Glass coating, which is a straight dupe of Lashify Glass.  The little fluffy knob on the end of the wand makes it easier to get into small areas like the tops of the lashes. I barely feel like this glue/bond combo needs a sealer though since there’s just not a lot of stickiness to deal with. Really the only other thing that you need to complete this kit is a good applicator tool, because I don’t care for using the regular set of tweezers included.  Not only is the angle not great for application, but there’s no way to fuse unless you use your fingers which I don’t care to do. I will update this review when I find out more about the longevity of the lashes. I always wait 24 hours before getting my lashes wet and that seems to allow them to cure properly.

target.title: I WANTED to like these but...
target.text: These just don't work well...  In theory, I LOVE them, but the acetone evaporates before gel polish will dissolve... I'd buy the silicone "Soakies" instead and see if those do a better job at preventing the evaporation.  I haven't used these on regular nail polish because it comes off so easily anyway... so, If they don't last long enough to dissolve gels, I can't endorse them... I also tried wrapping the fingers in foils and using a regular thick cotton round ( both cut and folded).  Still, the acetone evaporated before the gel was coming off... and the very thin pads included wouldn't work AT ALL... I even took a bottle of acetone, warmed it  (carefully) in a pan of hot water & soaked cotton pads, wrapped fingers in foils & continually re-wetted with additional acetone... THAT finally worked, but by that point, I could have just done it without the clips.  And, for self-use they are less than worthless...  trying to get them on and keep working is comedic. Additionally, a lot of toes won't fit at all because the clips just aren't large enough.

history.title: One of the best items I've ever ordered
history.text: I have several detangling brushes. None of them have disappointed me. But this one actually works great for a drying brush at the same time. So well, that I can dry my hair on the cool setting! Less damage! I have over processed hair, so using the cool setting is a huge benefit. I have never managed that before because it would take way too long. Not with this brush! I start with my hair upside down, making sure I haven't miss any scalp area. Being able to dry my hair with a detangling brush is so helpful, my hair is down to my shoulder blades and is super fine, tangling often. I'm just really impressed it provides solutions for more than one problem.

history.title: Quality appears to be very good
history.text: These eyelashes are very soft and natural feeling, with a sturdy base to them.  I don't really care for base that looks like a thick layer of eyeliner but this one is kind of a medium thickness so it's okay.  However, I have very thick hair and eyelashes that have gotten thinner over time and these lashes are so thick they look really fake on me.  They look okay, but I don't think they'll ever be my "go to" lash.  Still, it's obvious they're made with care and the quality appears to be very good if you're looking for thick lashes.

history.title: Very pretty finish
history.text: These are made with a clever design to ensure you are putting them on correctly.  According to the enclosed instructions, you always wear them so that the heart part of the backs are on top when you slide them onto the post of your earrings.  This insures that the weight of the earring pulls the heart against your ear which, in turn, counterbalances the earring and holds it securely against your ear.  They're really lightweight, but they work well.  I tried them on my heaviest earrings to see just how securely these backs hold and they do not disappoint.  Even using them with lighter earrings you can tell they are held much more tightly and upright against your ear.  They are designed so you can tighten or loosen the clasp on them so they're adjusted just the way you want them.  A friend gave me a set of these for Christmas and I liked them so I bought more for myself and a couple more sets for my sisters to try.  I'm happy that this set is 18K gold plated sterling silver so I won't have any problems with allergies.  They are a great idea and they have a very pretty finish.

history.title: Takes a lot of practice, but it's worth it
history.text: There is definitely a learning curve to using these.  The first time I tried it, I ended up with a lot of hair that didn't make it into the clip.  In subsequent tries, I ended up with the hairs at the very top of my head sticking up or outside the clip, and finally I ended up with the clip too far up on my head which resulted in my hair looking like a literal pony's tail!  But with continued practice, this clip ends up being very comfortable to wear, looking nice overall, and my hair looks like a soft and feminine fall of hair (see photos).  I'm glad I persevered because it's my preferred way to wear my hair now.

history.title: Leaves my hair soft and shiny
history.text: I have very thick, shoulder-length hair with a pretty, natural curl. Many conditioners leave my hair soft but pretty much straight.  When I use this conditioner, it leaves my hair soft and shiny, and tames the curl to a soft wave.  I love that this conditioner leaves me with two simple, easy choices for how to wear my hair depending on my mood.  I also LOVE the smell of it.

history.title: They hold my hair for a few hours
history.text:
I have tried hair combs a few different times in the past without much luck. I have thick, heavy hair that has been really long for more than 40 years and no combs were ever able to hold its weight. A few years ago I cut my hair shorter. Right now it's shoulder length; not quite long enough to put in a pony tail but too long to keep it easily out of my face. I hoped these combs would be a good interim solution and I absolutely loved the color and flash of the rhinestones.

With care, and holding onto the bottom part of my hair tightly while we place the combs, we can get them to hold my hair for a few hours (see photo) but then it starts to fall out unless we put the comb toward the top of my head. Then they stay in for twice as long. Still, I never make it through a full day with them, but while they last they look really pretty!

history.title: Lasted all day long and through the night
history.text: This oil has a very soft, pleasant smell.  It leaves my sweetheart's beard a bit darker, shiny enough to catch the light as he speaks or moves around, keeps it in place (I'd guess it's about a medium hold), but still leaves it soft to the touch.  It lasted all day long and through the night until he showered in the morning.

target.title: I absolutely love the versatility
target.text: This oil has a great peppermint scent, a light feel, and absorbs quickly into my skin.  I use it for many things, although I have a few favorites.  I rub it into my damp hands a couple of times a day which leaves them softer and, unlike usual, my cuticles are not cracked or split (see photo 1).  I spray four or five pumps into my hand, rub them together and run them through my towel-dried hair.  Then I leave it to air dry and it ends up curly and soft (see photo 2) and lasts a couple of days until I wash it again.  I absolutely love the versatility.

history.title: Gonna Take Some Practice To Achieve The Look I'm After - But It's A Beautiful Bronzer!
history.text: I just opened this and I can hardly wait to use it tomorrow! I can see that this will have to be swirled together in order to get a decent bronze look. The "Sun" part is SUPER dark and the actual bronzer part is pretty much my skin tone. If it's swirled together, it makes for a beautiful matte bronzy shade. I can tell, though, that it's gonna take some practice to achieve the actual shade I'll be comfortable with.  That "Sun" is practically BLACK but with a light hand, I do believe I can achieve the effect I'll be after! Not a disappointment in the least! I believe I'll have fun with this bronzer!

history.title: Best brow product I have ever used!
history.text: LOVE this!! So much smoother and creamier than Anastasia brow pomade. I can't believe i have never seen this before, I was missing out. This is just amazing for those of us who have to fill in brows. Try it, you may love it just as much as myself. I was stuck on the other one for 5 years, and thought it couldn't get any better....boy was I wrong! I have tried EVERY brow technique and product, from Maybeline pencils to Tom Ford and Cle De Peau and everything in between. This one is just so easy to use(if you are good with a brush) it's incredibly dense and lasts all day. A little bit goes a long way. I would recommend just with any cosmetic, to seal your face with a setting spray. So you don't have to worry about the product smearing or moving around. Hope I helped with any questions you may have had!

history.title: Love them!
history.text: Best price on amazon for this type glove. I was concerned with the size because of all the reviews but bought them anyway because all the others were 30 bucks and I wasn't paying that for them. I wear a size 7 glove which is a large in ladies gloves, I wear a size 9 shoe and I'm 5'8"....you may wonder why I told you that? Well, hands are relative to feet and height. My hand is just under 3 1/2 inches wide at its widest and these fit me perfect. Many people said they fit big and that worried me. SO IF you are short with little feet, these will probably fit you big. They will stretch and I would expect them to fit a glove size 8... and 9, which is huge for a woman, but pretty standard for a man. They will be big if you wear small or medium gloves.

history.title: ~ Moisturizing, Softening, Frizz-Taming ~
history.text:
My hair is thick, wavy, and color-treated. This Premium Nature Argan Oil Shampoo, Conditioner, and Thermal Shield Set works well for my hair type. The Argan Oil provides the extra conditioning I need without weighing my hair down. Although the bottles are smaller than the ones they sell separately, I like that these come in a set, since they all work great together. I see that most reviewers love the scent of these. That is the only thing I don't particularly like. Although the scent is unisex, it smells a little too masculine for my preference, but that is just my own preference. I love the handy flip lids on the shampoo and conditioner and the sprayer is great for the thermal shield. A huge plus to me is when a product comes with tamper-proofing, which this set comes completely wrapped in plastic, so I know it has not been tampered with.

The shampoo is rich and opaque and, just from the creaminess, I knew this would work well on my hair. The clear shampoos are usually not conditioning enough (in general), but the creamy ones, like this, are great. The conditioner is the same, very thick and rich, perfect for my wavy, dry, color-treated hair. It may weigh finer hair down a bit much, unless used more sparsely. The thermal shield helps keep my waves from becoming frizzy. It is lightly conditioning and softening. It sprays evenly and just the right amount. I like these being sold in the set for trial purposes and then the ability to purchase them separate as well, once you run out or the smaller set sizes.

This is a nice set of wonderfully moisturizing, softening, and frizz-taming products that add shine, bounce, and softness.

history.title: ~ Use this for Soft, Shiny, Deliciously Scented Hair! ~
history.text: Unite is my very favorite EVER Argan Hair Oil. First off, I love the smell, which is quite strong and smells like Neroli/Orange Blossoms. The scent is stronger than I usually like, but this is a scent I LOVE, so it works for me. It leaves my hair soft, shiny, and bouncy.

target.title: ~ Love this Beautiful & Highly Functional ELIK Professional Blow Dryer! ~
target.text: [[VIDEOID:178ac55cc2f318b3be3bcc8d8e013e25]] Absolutely love this beautiful and highly functional ELIK pearl-colored Professional Blow Dryer with lovely pink and gold accents, its strong brushless motor, and negative ion generation. My hair is thick and wavy, so I can either bring out my curls with the diffuser OR go with a smooth, silky finish with one of the concentrator nozzles. This dryer leaves my hair with no static electricity and softer, healthier-looking hair. There are so many choices with the five modes and different levels. I love to finish up with the cool shot, which helps hold whatever style I go with. This blow dryer really is perfect for any type of hair with all its possibilities. The magnetic and easy-to-use-and-position nozzles and diffuser are great. They stay in place well but attach and remove easily. The extra long cord is helpful. This folds up easily for storage or travel. It's super-lightweight and comfortable and easy to use. This arrived beautifully laid out in its product box and would make an absolutely lovely gift for someone special. Very happy with this very nice hair dryer.

I absolutely love it 💐🌸🌷❤️💜🌷🌟💕
10/10 would recommend!

history.title: Bendy, good for my toddler

Pros
Cute
Bendy plastic so won't break easily
It's actually on a head band so it stays better on my daughters head.

history.title: Love shampoo bars
history.text:
I love shampoo bars. Started trying them about a year ago and I've been trying a bunch just started with this. The smell is nice and it lathers very well. My hair feels totally clean. And I like when it dries. When I used shampoo and not conditioner I didn't like how my hair would feel. Well I don't have that issue with soap bars!my hair is soft and smooth. I also love that I'm not wasting plastic bottles anymore!!! And I'm in the shower less because there is less I have to do with my hair.

Update: I've tried a different bar. Between the two i feel like after I use this I still feel like maybe I could use conditioner. But that's only when my hair is wet. Once it dried I don't seem to have the issue. But I liked the other bar better because I didn't think I need conditioner anytime.

history.title: Neat little tool
history.text: Heats more than expected but doesn't burn or hurt. You have to carefully make sure the lashes are straight and not going the wrong way or they will stay that way. Best idea is use a regular curler and set the curl with this. Handy little tool. Glad I bought it. Won't use it everyday, just special occasions.

history.title: Yes To This One
history.text:
This mascara was a big surprise. It performs like a very expensive mascara at a drugstore price. No smudging, flaking or clumping. Washes off with pure water and a bit of rubbing. Add some cleanser and it's effortless to remove. I can fall asleep with it on and no black eyes in the morning, just a few flakes from sleeping. It offers full volume and lengthens well. If you use a curler, you can get a very dramatic effect. It's buildable for more false eyelash looks without being clumpy. The wand is not straight. It is like a smiley face curve. But with a twist of the end, it curves into a "u" shape to get different angles. I would love this even with a normal straight brush.
The only complaint is that it dries out faster than others I've used, but is about the same as tarte waterproof in this regard. My favorite mascara so far! I will be ordering extras in case it's discontinued.

history.title: Not for me
history.text: Did not like. It added thickness and darkened my lashes. But it was really clumpy. It went on like a mousse, kind of fluffy. I think thats what made it clump. It also clumped the lashes together besides leaving balls of mascara clumps on the lashes. I hoped for better based on the reviews, but it didn't go on nicely at all. It was sweatproof, yet it did smear over night just a bit. Honestly, it looked exactly the same in the morning as it did when I first applied it, besides the slight smudge under one eye. So I have to say, that's pretty bad to look like you slept in your mascara when it's been freshly applied. Big thumbs down on this one.

history.title: Hard to remove and only use one coat or it will glue up on you.
history.text: This had a super strong chemical smell. It looked nice with one coat. No thickness or volume but it lengthened ok. However it did dry super fast and adding a second coat was a terrible idea. It clumped into a sticky mess. One coat wasn't enough volume for me. It was hard to remove, I had to use castor oil. Pass on this one.

target.title: Nice length, but no volume.
target.text: With one coat, this looked pretty good. It gave pretty nice length. Not much volume. You can't do more than one coat though, cause it makes your lashes stick together really badly and you have to remove it and start again. It's super hard to remove, you need petroleum jelly, baby oil or olive oil. Something heavy duty. I need more volume and it was just messy to work with. It also smelled strongly of chemicals.

history.title: VERY happy with this purchase.
history.text: I love these stampers. They all came individually packaged. They are comfortable for me to hold, fairly squishy with a tacky/slightly sticky feel, and all of them picked up images beautifully right out of the package with no priming. I like having the two colors, because white or very light colored polish will show up on the red. I think these are very good value for the price. It's nice that the scraper has a plastic, not metal edge. I still prefer credit/gift cards sor scraping, as theyare slightly flexible, but I think this one would work very well for anyone who prefers a stiffer scraper.

history.title: VERY happy with this purchase.
history.text: I love these stampers. They all came individually packaged. They are comfortable for me to hold, fairly squishy with a tacky/slightly sticky feel, and all of them picked up images beautifully right out of the package with no priming. I like having the two colors, because white or very light colored polish will show up on the red. I think these are very good value for the price. It's nice that the scraper has a plastic, not metal edge. I still prefer credit/gift cards sor scraping, as theyare slightly flexible, but I think this one would work very well for anyone who prefers a stiffer scraper.

history.title: The plates alone are more than worth the price.
history.text:
This is such a good deal! The stamping plates alone are *well* worth $3.99, even with shipping added. I have always found Born Pretty plates to be good quality, and these are no exception. All the designs I have tried so far (most of them) have been well etched. The plates have sturdy plastic backings that extend slightly beyond the edges so you can grasp them without worrying about getting cut. It's nice to have such a variety of different style designs to work with.The scraper is credit card style, which I like, but it is a little thinner and more flexible than I am used to using. I like a bit more body than this one has. Still it is usable. The stamper is small but nice. I like the transparent style so I can see where I am placing an image. I had a little trouble picking up polish with it at first, so I primed it by repeatedly stamping it on a lint roller, and now it works just fine. All in all, I would say this could be an excellent starter kit for anyone wanting to try nail stamping.

The template with cutouts is something I hadn't tried before. The way it works is that you apply polish to the stamping plate and scrape it. Then lay the template on the stamping plate, and stamp on/through the opening. You need a fairly soft stamp for this to press down through the opening. (The one in this kit works fine.) Then you stamp your nail. You have to work fairly quickly to get it placed after scraping the polish (or use polish that dries slowly), but it does work.. I will say that the cut out areas are a little bit on the large side for my not too long nails. It might be fun to try using it to make decals, but I haven't gotten so far as trying that yet.

So as a starter kit, or to expand your plate collection I would recommend this item. Note: I have no affiliation with the seller, and purchased this with my own funds-no promotional discount.

Then lay the template on the stamping plate, and stamp on/through the opening. You need a fairly soft stamp for this to press down through the opening. (The one in this kit works fine.) Then you stamp your nail. You have to work fairly quickly to get it placed after scraping the polish (or use polish that dries slowly), but it does work.. I will say that the cut out areas are a little bit on the large side for my not too long nails. It might be fun to try using it to make decals, but I haven't gotten so far as trying that yet.

So as a starter kit, or to expand your plate collection I would recommend this item. Note: I have no affiliation with the seller, and purchased this with my own funds-no promotional discount.

history.title: Seem to work well
history.text: I just received these foam eye shadow brushes today. I received exactly 50. They seem nice and sturdy. The one I tried out picked up the eye shadow color well, and also worked very nicely for blending.  I chose them for the longer handles, which are easier for me to use than short ones. The foam heads seem to be attached well and I'm trusting will hold up to cleaning, as I hope to be able to get multiple uses out of these (I don't want to be throwing away lots of plastic). If they do hold up there will be way more than I will need myself, but maybe I can find someone to share them with.

history.title: Awesome!!!!
history.text: Smells great!!! Great, refreshing eucalyptus scent, and you only have to use just a tiny bit to lather up your whole beard. Even if you have a very large one. If you want a great beard wash, this is definitely the best I've had.

history.title: I LOVE Beardsmen's Bold Forest scent
history.text: I LOVE Beardsmen's Bold Forest scent, but this one not so much. When I first put it on I was expecting a more tea tree scent but didn't really get that. It says that it also has peppermint in it but that is not what I smell I put it on. I don't know how I would describe it but my particular ol factories just don't care for it too much. And I really didn't care too much for their citrus sent either. But I really LOVE their Bold Forest scent, but for some reason they are out of stock or not making it or something. It is unavailable here on Amazon and it is also unavailable at their official website. When and if it becomes available I would recommend getting that one instead or just buy the uncensored version. As far as the oil itself you will not find a better one because it is nice and light and non-greasy yet makes your beard soft and shine.

history.title: I like Beardsmen's Bold Forest the best
history.text: I like Beardsmen's Bold Forest the best, but to change it up a little bit I bought the Rousing Citrus. The Rousing Citrus isn't what you might expect. It is not that bright refreshing Citrus smell that you might be anticipating. It is more of a clove with citrus in the background. When you put it in your hands and onto your beard you smell the Citrus right away. But just as soon as you put it on your beard and rub it in the Citrus dissipate and there is a rather strong close scent. If you like the smell of clothes like I do then you will love it. If you don't then you will not like this sense at all. To be honest I had to use it about 3 or 4 times to really decide if I like it or not. So if you buy it and you used it for the first time and don't like it try it for another 3 or 4 days and see if you still don't like it. I think you'll find that it is a pretty good scent after all.

target.title: The best beard straightening brush I've ever
target.text: truth be told I have only used one but this is the only one I need to use from the performance that it is all really giving me a few times. It has three settings and I put mine on 355 I believe or whatever the middle setting is and I slowly brush my beard and it straightens it with perfection after about five or six go-rounds. There is a couple of brushes on the market for $100 or so which I think is ridiculous. This was about $27 and it works just as good as them. And the other ones are so small I would be afraid of burning myself while this one has quite a bit of a handle so you have better control in my opinion.

history.text: It a orange apricot color. It warms my skin. I have to be careful not to use alot because I am olive and not very tan. But this color would definitely be excellent on darker skin tones. Very pigmented and warm.

history.title: Covered in dust
history.text:
When I first received this it was great. Until the filter was covered in dust. I emptied it out. Took a blow dryer to it and the dust is collected in the filter, but it’s also blowing all over the place as well. I used stronger pressure from an air compressors to blow the dust out and it came out, however, it’s not sucking the air like it did when I first got it.
Solution? Buy more filters even if it hasn’t been 2-3 months I thought it may be good to rotate out 3 different filters daily and use the air compressor on the filters once a week. It’s still not sucking the air well. I’d avoid this at all cost. $69.99 on the dust collector, $19.99 on the replacement filters. My clothes are covered in dust. Do not purchase! Waste of money.

history.title: Waste of money
history.text: They worked great the first time I used each filter but that’s it. After being emptied and cleaned they don’t suck dust like they once did. history.title: Did not last
history.text: I have bought numerous extensions from different companies over the last 10 years, so I have plenty to compare these with.  When I first opened the box, I was happy to see beautiful, soft hair! Nice and long, a little thin, but there are 3 bundles so you get quite a bit of hair.  I usually have it put in by the sew in weave but I sewed clips on some of the pieces to try it first. It is thin, so I had to put 3 pieces on the clips. But very soft and silky! I tested some pieces by coloring, they got ratty very fast. The other pieces stayed fine for about 5-6 wearings, then also started to get tangled and bunched up. I never used shampoo to clean them, only lukewarm water with a heavy conditioner. I always took them out at night.  Price was right but not sure about the quality.  I have 1 1/2 of the bundle left and can't use.  :(

history.title: Still wearing
history.text: At first was not to happy with this extension, it seemed too thin. The width should be a little more so it can come around each side of your head. So I tried adding pieces from another extension to make it more full.  Also pulls on your hair, I think adding another clip or different positioning would help. But my head would be sore from the clips. The hair has stayed in pretty good shape. Beautiful color.  I wear this once in a while if I'm in a hurry, I just don't add the other pieces so it looks a little thin.  But overall, not a bad purchase for the money.

history.title: One time use is all its good for.

history.title: I have tiny strands of hair where there hasnt been any in 4years
history.text: I waited to write review so this product had time to work or not. It arrived 1July. I used that day & have used everyday as of 28July. There are actual tiny strands of hair growing from my scalp where there hasn't been in 4yrs due to medication needed from a horrific accident. Do exactly as instructions indicate. Product arrived well packaged. As a woman lost hair is devastating. To try products with no results will have most women severely depressed. This product made me smile, laugh, cry, and sob all in that order. It was so much to take in when I saw lil sprout's of my hair growing from my scalp, just amazing.. Definitely worth trying. Only 4 stars because I'm not sure how long I'll have to use or if I stop using will my hair stop growing. Other than that reason I would have given 5 star.. Would recommend.

target.title: Don’t do it. I want my money back :(
target.text: I ordered 5 bundles and they only sent 4. Then when I mentioned it they refunded me for one instead of sending it. The hair also arrived several days after it was supposed to. I waited until I had the hair installed for at least 2 weeks before leaving this review. The hair is super thin. It thankfully feels thicker once you wash it but I have only washed it twice and it’s already a horrible mess. I don’t use heat on it AT ALL!!! I have slept with it in braids on a silk pillow case since day one.I only use hair extensions approved shampoo and conditioner as well as special leave in oils for moisture. It feels more like heat safe synthetic than human hair.  In my opinion it is not worth the.money at all. The only good thing about the hair is that the tapes have held up beautifully. Other than that I would say a big No to purchasing again. I would return them if I could. Very disappointed. Now I have to celebrate Christmas with a ratty nest on my head because my hair dresser is out of town until after New Years. Save your troubles and money. Go with a different brand.

target.title: Skip this one and here’s why
target.text: The wig has so much potential as the hair quality doesn’t shed and the cut( albeit not my favorite look on me is cute) The color and roots are much darker than the photo, almost a mousy brown versus the lighter blond shown in some other reviewers photos. If there was a lighter blond available at some point, please bring it back. The color here just was too egh boring and blah for my taste. There was also tracks showing on one side so it’s not good to try and pass off as anything more than a photo opp wig really and for $22 I felt it wasn’t worth it....

history.title: Helpful tricks!! Great wig
history.text: Amazing! one word of advice though.. synthetic wigs are fibers do not have  mbrush ones like this with a "far back" or "deep" lace front (and that part is all hand tied btw) ,and then the rest of the wig is machine made,... or you will be inone big mess lol find the widest tooth comb u can and use that starting from the ends at the very bottom going towards top of head section by section slowwwwwly or "Luxor's wet brush" brushing same way Amazon definitely sells it think for about $8 or $10 but  not only is this brush  amazing for your hair but it's awesomeeeee for synthetic wigs as well as humans course. as you can see I am a licensed cosmetologist for over 12 years and I have never seen a brush transforn all of my clients hair into such healthier hair once you get this bro she will never go back ik back to the wig I never write reviews btw but thought I'd offer some advice bc I own over50 wigs!! Lol it's z healthy way to change ur hair color! Anyway Google what are the different material they use to make synthetic wigs and see which look is best for you!  As far as care goes get the comb or that brush along with baby oil, baby powder (or dry shampoo) ..a sulfate free shampoo n conditioner and this is so good for ur hair as well (Loreal has good ones that you can get anywhere) larger sized zip lock bags (not brand) (everything iin this review can be "equate brand" or any generic) clips, and finally an old empty spray bottle if U have one that use to be a product wash it good and refil it with bittled water or filtered  or just buy one in the "travel size items isle" and full that up...Ok so if the ends of your long shiny beautiful wig like this one gets frayed looking or frizzy you are aloud to use heat on this particular wig ( it usually always says it in the info somewhere) so what u wanna do is either wash n condition it first only if It's been a very long time..,.. do not wash synthetic wigs often! I repeat (ok u get it) ok so when u wash a wig ur suppose to fill sink up w a squeeze of shampoo n wTer let sit for 15 rinse. Cool water blot w towel then repeat  steps with the conditioner  and rinse w cool cold water. Ok then blow dry on warm or let sit over night n air dry then once wig is dry get you clips and spray bottle (or if u didn't have to was it you would start here) Clip the top sections up leaving all the hair right above ur ears and below down spray about 3-4 times w water set flat iron to 150-200 no higher! N take a your wet brush or comb n comb the damp hair n flat iron it while damp ull see steam that's ok ;) repeat steps until hair feels how it did when first purchased :) one your done get your baby oil n run a little like the size of a dime rub it on your hands as if it was lotion then take your hands and rub it through wig comb or brush it nicely n gently from ends to top n every evening before bed store it in a plastic bag try n get all air out of bag while sealing it! If u at least do the oil n bag every night for storage this will keep ur synthetic wig nice n it will last you way longer then if not. The bottoms of synthetic wigs tend to get ratty and poofy fizzy like looking so always be extra generous with moisture as wigs are not hair growing from your head getting all those natural oils.. And the flat iron n water trick is the best for that like I said..but anyway as your doing this an old lamp (not plugged in)!lmao or a huge candle will work as a manequin head or simply type in "styrofoam manequin head for wig "on here or go to ur local beauty supply and they should have one if you ask! They're like 3-$4 the baby powder or dry shampoo is for top to middie only(not in the bottom or ends) if wig is toooooi shiny looking! Ok I'm done holy crap no wonder y I don't write reviews lol ...but yes this wig is gorgeous Lolll hope I helped someone out there

history.title: Vie-Long Special Horse Hair PB14080
history.text: This brush is beautiful, although mine isn't red on top. It's kind of a persimmon color, still nice actually. The bottom is clear acrylic with white swirled in, in my case, about 50% mix. It's on the smallish side, handle is 1.73" tall, 1.34" wide and the loft of the hair is 2.03".  No noticeable odor upon receiving but haven't used it yet. Need to shampoo, rinse and dry a couple times before use. This is my first horsehair brush, this one is a 75th anniversary series and seems really soft but with a lot of backbone. Hoping and expecting this brush to be a good value with performance between badger and boar. Will update review after brush has been used enough to give proper critique.  Just be aware of size and variation of color.

I myself didn't prefer the color on myself so I did airbrush it with my Luminous Air brush makeup to give it the darker red tones you see in my pictures. The curls were too much for me so I paddle brushed the heck out of the wig, then with my flatiron on about 300° ran it through the hair to relax the curls even more. I love how it blends seamlessly with my natural hair line. I did cut just a few baby hairs to blend with my own. The wig is so light on my head, the hair is so soft but it tangled like crazy before I straightened the curls out.

history.title: I believe this is a perfect gray hair color
history.text: I believe this is a perfect gray hair color. No excessive blue tones and just enough Ash tone to it to create a deep multi-tonal and wonderful hair dye. I just wished it lasted a little bit longer. I will take this over any of the other 11 products I have tried in the last month.

history.title: Another phenomenal product. I've been on the hunt for ...
history.text: Another phenomenal product. I've been on the hunt for the ultimate gray/silver combo, and many dyes have just had too much blue or purple to them, but not this one.  I don't know how I left out on finding this, I had exhausted most of my resources with other name brands. My platinum blonde hair is now a deep and rich gray and has lasted longer than pulp riot, joico, or pravana.

history.title: Was Cute for Three Hours ...
history.text: ... until it broke as I opened a bottle of water. Yes, it literally broke in half, right through the band. Too bad; this should've been a cute trend piece I'd have for at least a little while.

history.title: Unusable for me
history.text: I'm terribly sorry to report that this is junk. After a weeklong dive into Civil War fashions, I wanted a snood! I picked this one. The net part presumably should expand to accommodate one's vhair, but my hair, which reaches my shoulder blades, was far too much, and too thick, for the not-very-stretchy capacity of the net bag part. Also, there was hot glue slopped across the bow part. If you have shorter or fine hair, this might work, as you can always remove strands of hot glue (though you shouldn't have to), but this is definitely not what I was hoping for. It was so cheap that I just pitched it.

target.title: Exquisite!
target.text: Wow, this gorgeous headband - headpiece, really - is incredibly beautiful. I have about 20 or so of these elaborately decorated headbands made of padded velvet, and although I definitely have fancier ones, this lovely floral-and-rhinestone number is the best in my collection. It's well-made, it's comfortable, and it makes me feel like some kind of Little House/medieval princess fairy hybrid! If you like it, definitely get one!

history.title: Great for Muscle Aches
history.text:
I’ve had severe back aches for about 3 years now-sometimes where my back freezes up and I can’t even stand up. I’m sick of pills,so when I came upon this lotion, it was really amazing. I didn’t realize what it was advertised for, so I just thought it’s for relieving pain. My “mistake” ended up freeing me of muscle pain and back cramps. It smells great too (like lavender, even though there’s none in it).
It’s like a masseus in a bottle.

history.title: Great human hair for under $200!
history.text: Okay let’s start by saying human hair lace front wigs for under $200 are rare. Good ones are almost impossible to find. This one is well worth the money. I ordered the 18” and when I received it (prime 2 days) it looked like a hot mess. Yellow, body wave soft but messy. I colored it with medium ash blond and light ash blond box color. It took the ash color too well! I went back and redid it in pale beige blond and lightened it up. I still need to do platinum highlights and a shadow root. I conditioned, blow dried and straightened with a flat iron. It straightened absolutely beautifully. I cut off about 3” because sadly the ends were too thin. The hair is gorgeous though. I curl it with a 1 1/4” curling iron and it looks great at first but curl doesn’t stay well in humidity. It remains soft smooth and silky though. Now the cap-lace front appears pretty much preplucked. I plucked my part. I did not pluck the edges as they were great as is. Lace melted into my hairline. Cap is comfortable and wefts do not show. Good natural density. My one issue:: this cap is BIG. That’s perfect if you have a bigger head or tons of bio hair but I don’t. I’m a petite average and the bigger circumference on this wig makes it difficult to lay the lace without overlap and buckling. Also the cap itself is a little baggy on me. I make it work but I could never wear it without a wig grip underneath and it’s still biggish. Overall though a great wig for the price!!

I used this when my face feels dry or when it stings a bit. I put it on after washing my face, before I go to sleep. The solution bonds to the face well and it leaves my face feeling hydrated and shining. Because the mask clings to the face really well, it seems like my face absorbs all of the solution. Because there are real chrysanthemums are on the mask, its really pretty and the scent is amazing. It felt like I was relaxed by just smelling the flowers.

target.title: When you feel like your skin needs rejuvenation and rest
target.text: When you feel like your skin needs rejuvenation and rest, the mugwort mask pack is probably a perfect fit. At first, I didn’t even know what a mugwort was, I had to look it up. It is used for many things and it seems like its very healthy for you as well. I used it when my face broke out into a mild rash and after using the mask, my face cooled and cleared up. And it smells really fresh too! Its pretty cool to see actual mugworts on the mask pack as well.

The safety razor I bought to go with it, fits nicely in the soace provided. Bristles are soft. This would be a nice gift for anyone who shaves and you’re at a loss what to get.

history.title: One of my favorites!
history.text: One of my favorite amazon wigs! The first one I received had track issues, but the seller quickly rectified. The second piece I received was perfect. The color is a perfect ash blonde shade. Hair is soft. Hairline is very realistic. Baby hairs in front. Roots go all the way through the wig down to the nape. Deeper part than most other middle part wigs on amazon. People think it’s my hair! What’s preventing 5 stars? The hair comb being in front instead of the back as well as the part needing to be plucked. If I could I’d give 4.5 stars. LOVE this one, no Regrets!

history.title: No regrets
history.text: I adore this unit! Braids are tightly done and are a beautiful mix of colors. Lace is transparent. Hairline is perfect and realistic. My only complaints are the braids are a bit itchy when touching my skin on my shoulders or chest, there’s no comb at the nape and the wig itself is fairly heavy. That being said, the pros far outweigh the cons. I love it and do not regret my purchase!

history.title: Gray roots and very yellow hair
history.text:
Disappointed. Pros: hair is very soft with a perfect wave. Part and hairline is awesome. Cap is comfortable and lace is transparent. Great manageable length.
Cons: The roots aren’t brown, or if they are it’s a very ashy shade to the point it looked gray. Maybe it was just mine but it looked terrible, especially up next to the yellow blonde. And it’s very yellow. It looked more of a honey blonde on my screen, but it arrived very very yellow. My skin tone works with most hair colors, but not this one. It aged me with the gray roots. Unfortunately I had to return. If this unit was made in any other shade of blonde with better roots it would have been perfect. So sad.

history.title: Nice unit at this price point!
history.text: Not a bad unit for the price! I was very hesitant on ordering and it’s been in my wish list for awhile but there were no reviews... I got an amazon gift card recently so I figured now would be the time to try it. The hair is soft enough, not incredibly soft but not terrible. It’s a bit on the shiny side but some baby powder can take care of that. The part is excellent. Looks real without a cap on underneath and goes deep. My head is 22 inches and this fit great. A comb at the nape of the neck is a must imo and this has one. I love the pretty colors. The pink is more peachy orange pink than pink pink but that’s ok. It goes from a super dark brown root to the peach pink to lavender to white/platinum blonde. One major dislike, and a reason I took away a star, is that it’s only rooted on top and along the front side of the unit. The rest of the hair underneath starts with the peach pink. Common at this price point but I’d rather pay a few dollars more and have it rooted the whole way through. But this is the only wig with this color that I can find so it is what it is. The lace is light enough to be nearly invisible on me. Not scratchy, the unit was comfy to wear. The hairline could stand to be plucked more naturally if I ever find the time. All in all im happy with it! Thanks!

target.title: Short, frizzy, matted hair on original and replacement unit but responsive customer service
target.text: I was really excited to get this wig. The images provided on the listing looked like the color I’ve been looking for. I posted a question asking the seller to provide images of the actual unit and the stock pictures I uploaded are the ones that were sent to me. Before I go any further I’d like to say the seller provided fast and courteous customer service, which is why my rating is 2 stars instead of 1. I’m terribly disappointed in the wig itself. The first unit I received, upon first taking it out, seemed nice and I was excited. There was a comb at the nape of the neck, the part looked nice and the hair itself felt soft and moved nicely. Then I tried it on and noticed a large bump on top of my head, which is what the picture with the red circle is. Turns out at the beginning of the track the hair is all short, frizzy and matted, like it was burned, which is what was causing that bump. I notified the seller and requested a replacement. The seller was responsive to my feedback and seemed genuinely interested in it and concerned about the quality. I received the replacement yesterday and it was even worse... :( The hair throughout the unit was very very dry and ratty. And the same issue was at the top, short, frizzy, matted hair, but more so. Soooo bummed about this. Seems to be some serious quality control issues wherever these units are being produced. This wig would have been so great if it wasn’t for what appears to be an overheating issue when making the waves. I hope the seller can get this fixed, because the colors are beautiful. Unfortunately I had to send both the original and replacement back.

history.title: So very disappointed and upset
history.text: I was so excited when I received my wig today. It was packaged nicely especially since it was sent in a box! When I first took the wig out I saw that I received some eye lashes but no wig cap. The hair on the wig is very soft and manageable but when I tried it on, the first thing I was disappointed in was that the cap was smaller than I expected. The color is beautiful but lighter than expected. But I was so disappointed in the construction of the wig. If you look at the picture of me you can already see the weft showing through the bangs. Then when you just lift up the side if the wig you can how badly made the wig is. It is like this from the ear up to the top of the bangs. I was so very upset with this because all the reviews raved how good the wigs are. I am returning the wig because there isn't anyway to fix it.

history.title: Not a bad wig
history.text: I want to say is that I ordered a black wig and this isn't a black wig. But it still is a beautiful color. The wig is soft when I first got it out of the bag but within minutes it started to get tangled pretty bad. Not in big clumps but in small knots that you would have to literally cut out. The bangs were shorter than the picture. The wig is very thick which would be good for styles like pig tails, if yours doesn't become tangled. The length is true as you can see. And the curl pattern is just like the description says. The cap is just what i like and it can handle long term wear.But. unfortunately I had to return it because of my wig becoming tangled. I still would recommend you trying their wigs because this could had been a mistake.

history.title: Mine was defective
history.text: The hair is soft and beautiful and that is the only thing I like about it. The wig i received had a wig cap that was falling apart and the top of the wig was so thin. I really wished it was better than this.

target.title: They are better than any wig grip i ever used
target.text: I honestly wasn't sure what to think of these wig grips but I am so happy I bought them. I actually got them to review them while I review wigs. Now some of the reviewers complaints were that the wig grips are tight and it is sort of true for me. But most my wigs are glueless ( and they usually are already tight) but it wasn't so bad that I couldn't wear them most of the day. I have an average size head. If you have a very sensitive head, I recommend you wear a wig cap because they can pull a haor are two. I do wear wig caps and the grip hold on the wig and the wig does sit still. Unless the wig is bigger than your head and then the wig might move around. But sometimes I don't wear a wig cap and it is comfortable for me. Now to get to the nitty gritty, these wig grip work better than any velvet wig grip I have every used. It has kept my non lace front and my lace fronts still on my head. They come in a clear a a clear tan color. I love using them alot! Especially with the lace fronts because you cannot see them through the lace and they do not leave "bumps" on the wig. I can pull them to the edge of my head and it is snug but not headache snug to me. Now I dont believe they are for people with big heads but I do suggest trying because you never know.

history.title: Worked great for me
history.text: I purchased these rods right before christmas and I was so excited once I got them.  I rodded my hair, wrapped my hair in a scarf and slept on the rollers with no problem.  When I woke up I had some wonderful curls.  My curls lasted for over three days and the only reason im sure they didn't last longer is because I had to wash them out.  I didn't have to use a bunch of hair spray or any other products for that matter and I ended up with soft, bouncy curls.  LOOVVVEEEE IIIIITTTTT.

history.title: This hair gives me life.....
history.text: I love this hair.  Made a 3/4 wig.  This hair was great from the start.  It came packaged nicely, it was soft, no odors at all (I still co-washed it though).  It's true to length in fact I believe they may have given me an extra inch on one my bundles. There was no tangling or shedding during the initial handing of the hair, I didn't even lose any hair during the co-washing process.  I sealed my wefts so of course the hair won't be shedding now either :)  I really like the wefts on this hair.  I've purchased some virgin hair and the wefts were so thick it almost made my installation look lumpy but these wefts are perfect.  They are not too bulky, nor are they paper thin (like most beauty supply hair).  I am also using a closure(did the old fake scalp trick) so I only ended up using maybe 2 1/4 bundles but if you don't have a closure the three bundles should be more than enough to do a complete FULL sew in.  I also ended up flat ironing it which made the hair look even better.  If you all want pictures of the unit let me know.  Overall I would definitely recommend this hair.

target.title: This is the softest hair I have ever had!
target.text: I really like the hair. Granted it's not the same quality as the $400-$500 hair but it's still very high quality. I would love to give this beautiful hair 5 stars but I had to take away one star because of the fly away hairs. I'm sure it's nothing a deep conditioning with some silicone couldn't fix but if you're a beginner you might want to take it to a stylist to do the deep conditioning. The bundles are full, the hair is extremely soft (oh my goodness it's so soft), it's very bouncy and lightweight, it doesn't tangle or shed (thank God), and it came beautifully packaged. Feel free to check out my detailed review on youtu be, my channel name is liber8tedone3.  Just in case you can't make it over there I've inserted some pictures below. If you have any questions feel free to ask.

history.text: This has been a favorite nail color of mine for several years. When I used to purchase it in the drugstore it wasn't always fresh, and sometimes got thick really fast. So I was concerned about ordering it, for fear it may be the same way or worse, but it's not. Product is actually much better consistency and even seems to stay on longer. The color rocks too! target.title: Great value for the $$!!
target.text: WOW, I am already very impressed with these just upon opening the package. It includes four double ended full size mascaras in (see photo, on my hand colors left to right): green, purple,  light blue and pink! The packages and tubes are really pretty too. The brushes are pretty big and a little bulky but it's still easy to apply. I layered the purple and blue just to try it on and there there is no strong odor or any other indication that they will be problematic and I have pretty sensitive,  allergic and dry eye problems. I will give an update after wearing them awhile if there's an issue but So far they look like really fun colors and a great value for what I paid with Prime and fast delivery. This could be one of my best amazon purchases in awhile yayy!! 😊 I'd highly recommend considering you'd pay this much for just one color usually.

history.title: The hair is ok...Good for Short Term Purposes
history.text:
I wanted to like the product. Overall the hair was ok, not the worse and not the best. I bought a total of 6 bundles- 2 sets.(18,20,22) and (16,18,20).

Pros- The hair bleached, colored easily. The cost was great. It was soft out the package and only had a slight odor that disappeared after I co-washed the hair.

Cons- The ends of the hair, particularly the 18 and 20 inches is very thin and tangled very easily. I resolved the tangles with a deep conditioning of the hair (SheaMoisture JBCO Deep Conditioner/Mask). I ended up trimming the ends of the longer bundles because of the thinness.

Overall, the hair is alright. I decided to use the hair for a quick weave. I'll add an update before I remove the hair in two weeks.

history.title: Great Hair... Exceeded My Expectations
history.text:
Overall the hair is good. I created a wig with the hair I received. I have worn the hair every day for about two weeks.
There was a slight smell to the hair when I received it. Once I shampooed and conditioned the hair, the smell disappeared. I bleached, toned and colored the ends of the closure and one of the bundles in different shades of purple. The hair still had a wave pattern even after washing and coloring. I had very little shedding with this hair. I would definitely purchase this hair again.

history.title: Please read complete Review. The five stars is for customer service.
history.text:
Updated Review: the five star rating is for customer service from the seller. We were able to resolve the issues I had with the hair and my original review is listed below. They were very helpful with working on a resolution to the issues after I voiced my concerns in my original review. Customer Service is important. I would consider using them again in the future.
Please always do research before purchasing items online.

Original Review: My hair shedded right out of the packaging. I wanted to like the hair. For the price, the hair is ok. The bundles were full.
The hair did not have an odor. The shedding was a bit excessive, which is the main reason I gave the hair three stars. I expect hair to shed when you cut the wefts or color the hair. It should not shed excessively right out of the package.

history.title: Surprisingly Good Hair. Better than what I expected.
history.text:
For the cost of the hair, I expected that the hair would be so-so. I was pleasantly surprised. The hair had no smell, true to length and the bundles are full.The hair had very little shedding. I have installed the hair and have worn it a little over a week. I decided to bleach some of the ends with Wella bleach powder and 20 volume developer just to see if the hair would lighten and the hair lighten to golden.

The only slight issue was that the closure was a natural black and the bundles were more of a natural brown.
I have purchase hair of the same length and paid 2-3 times as much and this hair was comparable to those purchases. I would recommend this hair as a cost efficient good option.

target.title: Ok Product...For the cost I can't really complain.
target.text: The cream made my skin soft. I did not see any difference as far as my scar or blemish marks. My main issue was that the container was so small and there was not much product in the jar. But for the cost, I can not complain.

I purchased this product again. At first I just wanted to try all different kinds, but I liked them all. If you don't want to buy 10 packages then this works out well as needed. In my case, sometimes I want more moisturezing care vs sometimes I NEED sensitive care. I'm willing to buy it again and again. Thanks.

Best way to try all 4 masks this seller is offering. It's little pricey masks so go ahead and try all to decide what works best for you. What I like about these masks are that has very generous amount of solutions in addition to the mask sheet. I usually put them in empty lotion jars and use them next a couple of days or so.

history.title: And it really does good job making your skin feel moisturized and replenished
history.text:
I haves used other lines from this company and all are meeting my expectations if not exceeds. Considering how affordable the price is it's really worth every penny you spend. Each care only costs you less than $2! And it really does good job making your skin feel moisturized and replenished. I can't complain anything honestly.

Pros: the price! And soft cloth texture and generous solution amount, not runny, very subtle clean scent

target.title: Since I was satisfied with other products I've tried from same manufacture
target.text: Since I was satisfied with other products I've tried from same manufacture, I was pretty confident that I want to try this one as well. It has dainty scent and the sheet is super soft. It is not too thin (rather thicker side) but stays intact on my face very well - it looks almost transparent. The sheet contains about 25ml of solution which is plenty and it is thicker and sticker side than runnier. After 15~20 mins I pat my face to soak the residue in and my skin feels super moisturized!

history.title: Knots like crazy, terrible customer service
history.text: The hair is great right out of the box until I put it in! It will knot stop knotting no matter how it is taken care of or styled. I use sulfate free shampoo and conditioner as well as let it air dry. I always sleep with it in a low ponytail or braid with a silk pillowcase and nothing seems to help. I have reached out about this problem before and only got a response of how to take care of my hair which I ALREADY do. I’m not sure if it was just a bad batch of hair or not. I’ve never had this problem before but hope it gets better soon or I will not be buying again! The company said they would send new hair and that was almost a month ago with nothing. Now I can’t return. Waste of money!!

history.title: light and hydrating
history.text: bought this cream about a month ago and it came wrapped in an additional plastic bag which i appreciated for extra protection.  when i initially tried the cream it felt hydrating even on my dry skin yet not overly thick or sticky.  i like the light texture as heavier creams can sometimes break me out.  after trying the cream for about a month i can see the difference in my skin.  i appreciate the good ingredients for a reasonable price point for someone like me who is on a budget.
