history.title: Can't imagine a superior model of nail-clippers
history.text:
It's sometimes hard to tell from small web photos just how a product will look and feel for real. The amazon picture for this clipper did look quite appealing, but I can say that in real life the item's quality is even higher than I'd been expecting. Really excellently designed weight and shape for a man's medium-size hands; perfectly balanced tension against the blade-closing action; great surface texture for easy gripping and avoidance of dropping during use. I especially like the wider-than-usual outer end of the push-lever--it doesn't slip away from under your thumb.

But the best part is how this clipper cuts through any sort of nails "like butter"--smoothly, so so easily. I can now trim my nails in half the time it used to take, and I no longer need to "smooth out" small sharp corners of nail that I used to get because of how the the whole instrument (older, smaller clippers I had) would move during the cutting action. It's very hard to find *any* purely straight-bladed nail clippers (which I find far more versatile than the curved ones) either online or in stores, and among the few available on amazon, I am convinced these can't be beat. The "pro" in its name is entirely appropriate.

Note 1: When you first unpack this product, the gap between the two cutting edges might not seem as wide as you might like, particularly for larger toenails, but then it opens to a better size when you get the push-lever handle up.

Note 2: This is my unvarnished and uncompensated opinion. The company did send me a very polite email a few days after I got the product, urging me to write a review, but not for any sort of consideration. I recommend them without reservation.

It is the BEST natural deodorant I have ever used without any side effect and I’m a SWEATER. I never stink, even after a long kickboxing or spin class. Plus it’s easy on my sensitive skin. history.title: Excellent Product Ever!
history.text:
My daughter had been using this product since she was 8 years old. I did my research and checked out Schmidts, Toms, and the other natural deodorants that don't work. I didn't want to use the traditional brands like Axe.

This product is a godsend. It's like teeny tiny fairies are helping his armpits stay fresh and smell good.

Thank you so much!

target.title: I LOVE DEO!
target.text:
I try to stick to natural products wherever I can. I had been using another natural deodorant which smelled nice and that my skin liked, but I had to reapply it several times a day. I work out at home on a daily basis, and that gave the product a run for its money.

When I was ready to reorder, this product came up. I decided to give it a try. And it works really well. The scent is light and very nice, the consistency is creamy and it goes on smoothly. And best of all, I don't need to reapply it as often. I use it after a shower in the evening and sometimes, I don't reapply it at all the next day.

Since I don't need to use it more than once or twice a day, it's going to last me much longer than the previous brand which was just as expensive.

I am very happy with this product and would recommend it based on my experience.
One person found this helpful

It is so dense and combs through without tangling and has little to none.  It’s a beautiful color and the curl is bouncy and fun! Best part is you can live your blonde fantasy !

history.title: Make the jump it’s so worth it !
history.text: Love this wig!!!! The color is so pretty and looks super natural. The hair fibers are so soft and when combed through there’s little to no fall out. Doesn’t tangle easily. It takes you from bald to long gorgeous locks! The hair line is so natural you swear the hair is yours!

target.title: Get this wig ASAP!

The hairline is super natural and has room for edges ! It has a deep parting space so you can style it however you want! It had a nice density and sits on the head great ! Well worth the money and is amazing quality so you get more than your money’s worth !

history.title: Too early to know results for sure but so far love it.
history.text: First of all the packaging is so sleek, sheen, and cute- and it does come with 2 pumps!! I wasnt expecting that but super happy as I knew I'd be using more than needed and wasting if I were just pouring straight from the bottle/s. Which leads me to my second point- I still think I used more than needed, particularly the conditioner. My hair is thin & rather short now so I don't need much as is, but because it's so dry & brittle the conditioner seemed to have a bit of difficulty actually saturating and smoothing out so I kept pumping more out and adding it. Well I ended up just clipping it back to sit for a bit like usual & let me tell you...when I took it out it was so silky smooth I was surprised it didnt fall out of the clip on it's own. The smell is a rather strong floral scent, I've noticed all my Korean hair products have a strong floral scent to them tho & personally I dont mind it. Havent used long enough for much result yet but will update.

history.title: This product is AMAZING
history.text: I have always had a problem of curly, frizzy, messy hair. And while I absolutely love my curls, there are days when I want to have that magazine perfect sleek, silky, STRAIGHT hair! But don't really have the patience to straighten them on my own with a flat iron & don't always have the time to go to a Salon. So I decided to give the simply straight Hair Brush Straightener a try on my thick curly natural hair!!！
